## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-108">ABA-routningsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-109">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-110">Nio siffror som kan vara i ett formaterat eller oformaterat mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-111">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-112">två siffror i områdena 00-12, 21-32, 61-72 eller 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-113">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-114">Ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-115">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-116">Ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-117">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-118">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-119">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-120">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-121">En princip har med medelhög säkerhet upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om, inom 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-122">Funktionen för Func_aba_routing hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-123">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_ABA_Routing hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-124">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-125">Funktionen för Func_aba_routing hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-143">Argentinas national identity (DNI) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-144">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-145">Åtta siffror med eller utan punkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-146">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-147">Åtta siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-148">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-149">en valfri period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-150">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-151">en valfri period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-152">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-153">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-154">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-155">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-156">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-157">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_argentina_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-158">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_argentina_national_id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-170">Argentinas unika skatteidentifieringsnyckel (CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-171">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-172">11 siffror med streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-172">11 digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-173">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-174">11 siffror med ett streck:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-174">11 digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-175">två siffror i 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 eller 34</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-176">ett bindestreck (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-177">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-178">ett bindestreck (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-179">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-180">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-181">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-182">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-183">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-184">Funktionen hittar `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-185">Ett nyckelord `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-186">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-187">Funktionen hittar `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-226">Bankkontonummer för Australien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-228">Sex till tio siffror med eller utan ett bankkontorsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-228">six to 10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-229">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-230">Kontonumret kan vara 6 till 10 siffror.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-231">Bankkontor i Australien:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-232">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-232">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-233">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-233">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-234">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-235">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-236">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-237">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-238">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-239">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_australia_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-240">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_australia_bank_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-241">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-242">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-243">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_australia_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-244">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_australia_bank_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-267">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-268">11 siffror med valfria avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-268">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-269">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-270">11 siffror med valfria avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-270">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-273">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-273">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-274">Ett valfritt bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-274">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-275">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-275">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-276">Ett valfritt bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-276">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-277">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-277">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-278">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-279">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-279">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-280">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-281">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-281">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-282">Funktionen Func_australian_business_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-282">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-283">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_australian_business_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-283">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-284">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-285">Funktionen Func_australian_business_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-285">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-296">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-296">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-297">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-297">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-298">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-298">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-299">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-299">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-300">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-300">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-301">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-301">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-302">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-303">Nio siffror med avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-303">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-304">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-305">Nio siffror med avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-305">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-306">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-306">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-307">ett blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-307">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-308">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-308">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-309">ett blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-309">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-310">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-310">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-311">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-312">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-312">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-313">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-314">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-314">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-315">Funktionen för Func_Australian_Company_Number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-315">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-316">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Australian_Company_Number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-316">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-317">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-317">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-328">Australiens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-329">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-330">nio bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-331">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-332">Nio bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-333">två siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-334">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-334">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-335">Fem siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-336">ELLER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-337">En till två valfria bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-338">fyra till nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-339">ELLER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-340">nio siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-341">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-342">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-343">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-344">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-345">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_australia_drivers_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-346">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-347">Inget nyckelord från Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-447">Australiens medicinska kontonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-448">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-449">10–11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-450">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-451">10–11 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-452">Den första siffran i intervallet 2–6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-453">En nionde siffra är en kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-453">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-454">Tionde siffran är problemets siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-455">Elfte siffran (valfritt) är det enskilda talet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-456">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-457">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-458">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-459">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-460">Funktionen för Func_australian_medical_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-461">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-462">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-474">Australien passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-476">Åtta eller nio alfanumeriska tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-477">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-478">en bokstav (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) följt av sju siffror eller</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by seven digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-479">Två bokstäver (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) följt av sju siffror.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-479">Two letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by seven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-480">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-481">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-482">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-483">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-484">Det reguljära `Regex_australia_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-485">Ett nyckelord `Keyword_australia_passport_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-486">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-487">Det reguljära `Regex_australia_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-507">Australiens skattenummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-508">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-509">åtta till nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-510">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-511">Åtta till nio siffror visas vanligtvis med blanksteg enligt följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-512">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-512">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-513">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-513">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-514">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-514">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-515">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-515">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-516">Två till tre siffror där den sista siffran är en bård</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-517">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-518">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-519">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-520">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-521">Funktionen för Func_australian_tax_file_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-522">Inget nyckelord från Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number eller Keyword_number_exclusions hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-523">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-535">Österrikes körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-536">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-537">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-538">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-539">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-539">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-540">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-541">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-541">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-542">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-543">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-544">Det reguljära  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-545">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-672">Österrike-identitetskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-673">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-674">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-675">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-676">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-677">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-678">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-679">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-680">En kombination av bokstäver, siffror och specialtecken med 24 tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-681">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-682">24 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-682">24 characters:</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-683">22 bokstäver (inte versaler, siffror, omslag, snedstreck eller plustecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-684">Två bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga), siffror, omslag, snedstreck, plustecken eller likhetstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-685">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-686">Ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-686">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-687">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-688">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-689">Det reguljära  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-690">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-696">Österrike passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-697">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-698">En bokstav följt av ett valfritt blanksteg och sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-699">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-700">En kombination av en bokstav, sju siffror och ett blanksteg:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-701">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-702">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-703">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-703">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-704">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-705">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-705">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-706">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-707">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-708">Det reguljära  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-709">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-710">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-711">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-712">Det reguljära  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-713">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-737">Österrikes personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-738">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-739">10 siffror i det angivna formatet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-740">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-741">10 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-741">10 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-742">Tre siffror som motsvarar ett serienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-743">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-744">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-745">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-746">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-746">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-747">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-748">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-749">Funktionen hittar  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-750">ett nyckelord  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-751">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-752">Funktionen hittar  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-762">denkkenka uppnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-762">krankenkassennummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-764">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-764">socialsecurityno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-770">sozialversicherungsnummer #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-770">sozialversicherungsnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-771">sofferle sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-771">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-772">solesicherheitkein #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-772">sozialesicherheitkein#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-773">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-773">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-774">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-774">ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-776">versicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-776">versicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-777">zdravstveno zavarovanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-777">zdravstveno zavarovanje</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-778">Österrikes skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-779">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-780">Nio siffror med valfritt bindestreck och snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-781">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-782">Nio siffror med valfritt bindestreck och snedstreck:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-783">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-784">Ett bindestreck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-785">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-786">ett snedstreck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-787">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-787">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-788">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-789">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-789">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-790">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-791">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-792">Funktionen hittar  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-793">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-794">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-795">Funktionen hittar  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />

        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">

        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-818">Moms i Österrike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-819">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-820">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-821">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-822">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-823">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-824">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-825">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-826">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 11 tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-827">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-828">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 11 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-829">A eller a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-830">T eller t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-831">Valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-832">U eller u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-833">valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-834">två eller tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-835">valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-836">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-837">valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-838">en eller två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-839">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-840">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-841">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-842">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-843">Funktionen för Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-844">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-845">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-846">Funktionen för Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-864">Azure DocumentDB-autentiseringsnyckel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-865">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-866">Strängen "DocumentDb" följt av de tecken och strängar som beskrivs i mönstret nedan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-867">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-868">Strängen "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-869">Valfri kombination av 3–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-870">En större än-symbol (>), ett likhetstecken (=), ett citattecken ("), eller en apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-871">Valfri kombination av 86 gemener eller versaler, siffror, snedstreck (/) eller plustecken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-872">Två likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-873">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-874">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-875">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-876">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-877">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-878">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_CommonExampleKeywords hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-879">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-879">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-881">(Tekniskt sett identifierar den här typen av känslig information dessa nyckelord med hjälp av ett reguljärt uttryck, inte en nyckelordslista.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-881">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-888">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-888">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-889">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-889">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-890">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-890">com</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-893">Azure IAAS-databasanslutningssträng och Azure SQL en anslutningssträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-893">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-894">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-894">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-895">Strängen "Server", "server" eller "datakälla" följt av de tecken och strängar som beskrivs i mönstret nedan, inklusive strängen "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-895">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-896">com" eller "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-896">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-897">net" eller "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-897">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-898">net" och strängen "Lösenord" eller "lösenord" eller "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-898">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-899">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-899">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-900">strängen "Server", "server" eller "datakälla"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-900">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-901">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-902">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-903">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-904">valfri kombination av 1–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-904">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-905">Strängen "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-905">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-907">net" eller "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-907">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-908">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-908">net"</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-916">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-916">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-918">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-919">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-919">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-920">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-920">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-921">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_CommonExampleKeywords hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-921">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1009">valfri kombination av 1–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1009">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1011">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1011">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1012">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1012">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1013">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1013">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1014">valfri kombination av 43 tecken som är gemener eller versaler, siffror, snedstreck (/) eller plustecken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1014">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1015">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1015">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1016">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1016">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1017">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1017">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1018">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1018">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1019">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1019">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1020">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1020">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1021">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_CommonExampleKeywords hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1021">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
