## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1036">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1036">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1037">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1038">Strängen "sig" följt av de tecken och strängar som beskrivs i mönstret nedan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1038">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1039">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1039">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1040">strängen "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1040">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1041">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1041">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1042">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1042">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1043">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1043">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1044">valfri kombination av 43–53 tecken som är gemener eller versaler, siffror eller procenttecken (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1044">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1045">strängen "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1045">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1046">alla tecken som inte är en bokstav med gemener eller versaler, siffror eller procenttecken (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1046">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1047">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1048">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1048">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1049">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1050">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1051">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureSAS hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1051">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1065">strängen "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1065">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1066">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1066">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1067">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1067">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1068">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1068">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1069">valfri kombination av 43 tecken som är gemener eller versaler, siffror, snedstreck (/) eller plustecken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1069">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1070">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1070">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1075">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1075">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1095">strängen "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1095">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1096">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1096">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1097">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1097">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1098">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1098">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1099">valfri kombination av 1–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1099">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1101">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1101">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1102">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1102">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1103">noll till två blankstegstecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1103">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1104">valfri kombination av 86 tecken som är gemener eller versaler, siffror, snedstreck (/) eller plustecken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1104">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1105">två likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1105">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1108">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1109">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1130">Azure Storage (allmän)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1130">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1131">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1132">Valfri kombination av 86 gemener eller versaler, siffror, snedstreck (/) eller plustecken (+), före eller efter tecknen som beskrivs i mönstret nedan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1132">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1133">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1133">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1134">noll till ett av symbolen större än (>), apostrof ('), likhetstecken (=), citattecken (") eller nummertecken (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1134">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1135">valfri kombination av 86 tecken som är gemener eller versaler, siffror, snedstreck (/) eller plustecken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1135">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1136">två likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1136">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1137">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1138">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1139">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1140">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1140">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1141">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1141">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1142">Belgiens licensnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1142">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1143">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1144">10 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1144">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1145">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1146">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1146">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1147">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1148">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1148">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1149">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1150">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1150">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1151">Det reguljära  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1151">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1152">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1152">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1285">Belgiens nationalnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1285">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1286">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1287">11 siffror plus valfria avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1287">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1288">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1289">11 siffror plus avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1289">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1290">Sex siffror och två valfria punkter i formatet YY. MM.DD för födelsedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1290">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1291">En valfri avgränsare från punkt, streck, blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1291">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1292">Tre siffror i följd (udda för män, även för kvinnor)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1292">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1293">En valfri avgränsare från punkt, streck, blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1293">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1294">två kontrollsiffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1294">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1295">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1296">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1296">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1297">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1298">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1299">Funktionen för Func_belgium_national_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1299">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1300">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_belgium_national_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1300">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1301">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1301">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1302">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1302">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1303">Funktionen för Func_belgium_national_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1303">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1304">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1304">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1363">Belgien passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1363">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1364">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1365">Två bokstäver följt av sex siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1365">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1366">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1367">Två bokstäver och följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1367">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1368">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1369">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1369">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1370">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1370">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1371">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1372">Det reguljära  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1372">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1373">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1373">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1374">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date2` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD MM YY eller ett nyckelord från eller `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1374">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1375">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1375">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1376">Det reguljära  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1376">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1377">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1377">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1404">Nummer för moms för belgien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1404">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1405">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1405">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1406">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1406">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1407">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1407">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1408">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1408">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1409">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1409">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1410">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1411">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1412">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 12 tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1412">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1413">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1414">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 12 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1414">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1415">a bokstaven B eller b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1415">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1416">ett bokstaven E eller e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1416">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1417">en siffra 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1417">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1418">en siffra mellan 1 och 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1418">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1419">En valfri punkt eller ett bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1419">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1420">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1420">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1421">En valfri punkt eller ett bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1421">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1422">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1422">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1423">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1424">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1424">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1425">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1426">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1427">Funktionen Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1427">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1428">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1428">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1429">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1430">Funktionen Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1430">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1442">Brasiliens CPF-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1442">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1443">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1444">11 siffror som innehåller en bediff och kan formateras eller vara oformaterade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1444">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1445">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1446">Formaterat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1446">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1447">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1447">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1448">en punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1448">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1449">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1449">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1450">en punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1450">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1451">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1451">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1452">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1452">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1453">två siffror som anger siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1453">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1454">Oformaterat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1454">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1455">11 siffror där de två sista siffrorna är kontrollsiffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1455">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1456">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1457">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1458">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1459">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1460">Funktionen för Func_brazil_cpf hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1460">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1461">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_brazil_cpf hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1461">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1462">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1462">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1463">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1464">Funktionen för Func_brazil_cpf hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1464">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1465">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1467">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1467">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1468">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1468">CPF</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1470">Registrering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1470">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1471">Intäkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1471">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1472">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1472">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1473">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1473">Imposto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1474">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1474">Identificação</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1477">Brasiliens juridiska enhetsnummer (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1477">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1478">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1479">14 siffror som innehåller ett registreringsnummer, branchnummer och kontrollera siffror, plus avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1479">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1480">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1481">14 siffror plus avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1481">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1482">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1482">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1483">en punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1483">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1484">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1484">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1485">en punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1485">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1486">tre siffror (de åtta första siffrorna är registreringsnumret)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1486">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1487">ett snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1487">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1488">fyrsiffrigt branchnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1488">four-digit branch number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1489">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1489">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1490">två siffror som anger siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1490">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1491">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1492">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1492">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1493">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1494">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1494">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1495">Funktionen för Func_brazil_cnpj hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1495">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1496">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_brazil_cnpj hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1496">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1497">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1497">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1498">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1498">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1499">Funktionen för Func_brazil_cnpj hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1499">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1500">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1514">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1514">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1515">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1515">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1522">Brasiliens national identification card (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1522">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1523">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1524">Registro Geral (gammalt format): Nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1524">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nytt format): 11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1526">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1527">Registro Geral (gammalt format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1527">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1528">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1528">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1529">en punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1529">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1530">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1531">en punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1531">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1532">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1532">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1533">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1533">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1534">en siffra som är en biffrig siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1534">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nytt format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1536">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1536">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1537">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1537">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1538">en siffra som är en biffrig siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1538">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1539">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1540">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1540">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1541">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1542">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1542">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1543">Funktionen för Func_brazil_rg hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1543">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1544">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_brazil_rg hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1544">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1545">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1545">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1546">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1546">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1547">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1547">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1548">Sådär de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1548">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1549">identitetskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1549">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1550">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1550">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1551">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1551">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1553">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1553">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1554">RG (det här nyckelordet är fallkänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1554">RG (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1555">RIC (det här nyckelordet är fallkänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1555">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1556">Bulgariens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1556">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1557">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1558">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1558">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1559">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1560">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1560">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1561">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1562">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1562">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1563">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1564">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1565">Det reguljära  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1565">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1566">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1699">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1699">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1700">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1701">10 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1701">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1702">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1703">10 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1703">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1704">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet (AMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1704">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1705">två siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1705">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1706">en siffra som motsvarar kön: En jämn siffra för man och en udda siffra för kvinna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1706">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1707">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1707">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1708">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1709">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1710">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1711">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1712">Funktionen hittar  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1712">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1713">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1713">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1714">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1714">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1715">Funktionen hittar  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1715">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1760">Bulgarien passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1760">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1761">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1762">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1762">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1763">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1764">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1764">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1765">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1766">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1766">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1767">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1768">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1769">Det reguljära  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1769">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1770">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1771">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1771">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1772">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1773">Det reguljära  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1773">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1774">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1774">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1794">Bankkontonummer för Kanada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1794">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1795">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1796">7 eller 12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1796">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1797">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1798">Ett bankkontonummer i Kanada har 7 eller 12 siffror.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1798">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1799">Ett bankkontotransitnummer för Kanada är:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1799">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1800">fem siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1800">five digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1801">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1801">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1802">tre siffror ELLER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1802">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1803">en nolla "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1803">a zero "0"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1804">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1804">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1805">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1806">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1807">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1808">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1808">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1809">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_canada_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1809">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1810">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_canada_bank_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1811">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1811">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1812">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1813">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_canada_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1813">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1814">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_canada_bank_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1814">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1838">Kanadas körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1838">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1839">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1840">Varierar per provins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1840">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1841">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1842">Olika mönster som täcker:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1842">Various patterns covering:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1843">Alberta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1843">Alberta</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1844">British Columbia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1844">British Columbia</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1845">Manitoba</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1845">Manitoba</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1846">New Brunswick</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1846">New Brunswick</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1847">Newfoundland/Labrador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1847">Newfoundland/Labrador</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1848">Nova Scotia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1848">Nova Scotia</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1849">Ontario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1849">Ontario</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1850">Prince Edward Island</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1850">Prince Edward Island</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1851">Quebec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1851">Quebec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1852">Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1852">Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1853">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1853">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1854">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1854">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1855">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1855">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1856">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1857">Funktionen Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1857">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1858">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1858">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1859">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_canada_drivers_license hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1859">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />

      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1995">Kanadas hälsotjänstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1995">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1996">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1996">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1997">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1997">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1998">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1998">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-1999">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-1999">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2000">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2000">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2001">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2001">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2002">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2002">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2003">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2003">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2004">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_canada_health_service_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2004">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2005">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_canada_health_service_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2005">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2006">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2006">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2007">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2007">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2008">personligt hälsonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2008">personal health number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2010">hälsotjänster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2010">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2011">specialtjänster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2011">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2012">bil misstag</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2012">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2013">patient sjukhus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2013">patient hospital</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2017">Kanada passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2017">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2018">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2018">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2019">Två versaler följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2019">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2020">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2020">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2021">Två versaler följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2021">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2022">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2023">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2023">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2024">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2025">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2026">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_canada_passport_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2026">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2027">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_canada_passport_number eller Keyword_passport hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2027">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2028">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2028">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2029">Keyword_canada_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2029">Keyword_canada_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2030">kanadensiskt klipp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2030">canadian citizenship</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2031">kanadensiskt pass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2031">canadian passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2032">passport-program</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2032">passport application</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2033">passfoton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2033">passport photos</span></span>

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2057">Canada Personal Health Identification Number (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2057">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2058">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2059">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2059">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2060">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2061">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2061">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2062">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2063">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2064">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2065">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2065">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2066">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_canada_phin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2066">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2067">Minst två nyckelord från Keyword_canada_phin eller Keyword_canada_provinces hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2067">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
