## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2100">Kanadas socialförsäkringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2100">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2101">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2102">Nio siffror med valfria bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2102">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2103">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2104">Formaterat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2104">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2105">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2105">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2106">Ett bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2106">a hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2107">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2107">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2108">Ett bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2108">a hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2109">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2109">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2110">Oformaterad: nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2110">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2111">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2112">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2112">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2113">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2114">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2114">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2115">Funktionen för Func_canadian_sin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2115">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2116">Minst två av följande mönster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2116">At least two of the following patterns:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2117">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_sin hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2117">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2118">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_sin_collaborative hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2118">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2119">Funktionen Func_eu_date hittar ett datum i rätt datumformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2119">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2120">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2120">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2121">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2121">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2122">Funktionen för Func_unformatted_canadian_sin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2122">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2123">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_sin hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2123">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2124">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2124">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2149">Chiles identitetskortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2149">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2150">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2151">sju till åtta siffror plus avgränsare en kontrollerad siffra eller bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2151">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2152">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2153">sju till åtta siffror plus avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2153">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2154">En till två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2154">one to two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2155">en valfri period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2155">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2156">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2157">en valfri period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2157">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2158">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2158">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2159">ett streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2159">a dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2160">en siffra eller bokstav (inte en teckenkänslig) som är en kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2160">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2161">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2162">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2162">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2163">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2164">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2164">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2165">Funktionen för Func_chile_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2165">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2166">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_chile_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2166">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2167">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2168">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2169">Funktionen för Func_chile_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2169">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2170">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2170">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2207">Inhörande identitetskort (Folkrepubliken Kina) i Kina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2207">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2208">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2209">18 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2209">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2210">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2211">18 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2211">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2212">Sex siffror som är en adresskod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2212">six digits that are an address code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2213">Åtta siffror i formuläret YYYYMMDD, som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2213">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2214">tre siffror som är en orderkod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2214">three digits that are an order code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2215">en siffra som är en biffrig siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2215">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2216">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2217">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2217">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2218">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2219">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2219">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2220">Funktionen för Func_china_resident_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2220">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2221">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_china_resident_id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2221">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2222">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2223">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2223">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2224">Funktionen för Func_china_resident_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2224">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2225">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2226">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2226">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2227">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2227">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2228">Insvarande identitetskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2228">Resident Identity Card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2229">Folkrepubliken Kina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2229">PRC</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2230">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2230">National Identification Card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2231">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2231">身份证</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2232">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2232">居民 身份证</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2233">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2233">居民身份证</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2234">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2234">鉴定</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2235">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2235">身分證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2236">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2236">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2237">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2237">鑑定</span></span>


## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2238">Kreditkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2238">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2239">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2240">14 till 16 siffror som kan vara formaterade eller oformaterade (ddddddddddd) och som måste passera Luhn-testet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2240">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2241">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2242">Identifierar kort från alla större varumärken över hela världen, inklusive Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, presentkort och betalkort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2242">Detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2243">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2244">Ja, Luhn-kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2244">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2245">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2246">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2246">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2247">Funktionen Func_credit_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2247">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2248">Något av följande är sant:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2248">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2249">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_cc_verification hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2249">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2250">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_cc_name hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2250">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2251">Funktionen Func_expiration_date hittar ett datum i rätt datumformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2251">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2252">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2253">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2253">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2254">Funktionen Func_credit_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2254">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2255">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2256">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2256">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2516">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2517">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2517">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2518">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2519">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2519">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2521">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2522">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2523">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2523">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2524">Det reguljära  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2524">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2525">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2525">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2650">Den här enheten ingår i den typ av känsligt id-nummer som är känslig för EU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2650">This entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2651">Det är tillgängligt som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2651">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2652">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2653">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2653">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2654">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2655">nio siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2655">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2656">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2657">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2657">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2658">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2659">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2659">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2660">Funktionen för Func_croatia_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2660">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2661">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_croatia_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2661">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2692">Kroatien passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2692">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2693">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2694">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2694">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2695">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2696">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2696">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2697">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2698">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2698">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2699">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2700">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2700">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2701">Det reguljära  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2701">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2702">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2703">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2703">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2704">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2705">Det reguljära  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2705">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2706">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2707">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2707">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2719">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2719">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2723">br putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2723">br putovnice</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2724">Kroatiens id-nummer (OIB)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2724">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2725">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2726">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2726">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2727">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2728">11 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2728">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2729">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2729">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2730">slutsiffra är en kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2730">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2731">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2732">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2732">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2733">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2734">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2735">Funktionen för Func_croatia_oib_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2735">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2736">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2736">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2737">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2738">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2738">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2739">Funktionen för Func_croatia_oib_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2739">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2740">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2740">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2771">Licensnummer för cyperns drivrutiner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2771">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2772">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2773">12 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2773">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2774">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2775">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2775">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2776">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2777">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2777">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2778">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2779">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2779">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2780">Det reguljära  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2780">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2781">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2781">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2906">Identitetskort för Cypern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2906">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2907">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2907">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2908">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2908">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2909">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2909">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2910">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2910">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2911">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2911">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2912">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2912">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2913">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2914">10 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2914">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2915">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2916">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2916">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2917">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2918">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2918">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2919">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2920">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2921">Det reguljära  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2921">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2922">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2922">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2923">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2923">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2924">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2924">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2931">Cypern passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2931">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2932">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2933">en bokstav följt av 6–8 siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2933">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2934">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2935">en bokstav följt av sex till åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2935">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2936">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2937">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2938">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2939">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2939">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2940">Det reguljära  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2940">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2941">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2941">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2942">Det reguljära `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD/MM/YYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2942">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2943">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2943">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2944">Det reguljära  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2944">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2945">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2945">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2974">Skatteidentifieringsnummer för Cypern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2974">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2975">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2975">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2976">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2976">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2977">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2977">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2978">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2978">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2979">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2979">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2980">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2980">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2981">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2982">Åtta siffror och en bokstav i det angivna mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2982">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2983">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2984">Åtta siffror och en bokstav:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2984">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2985">a "0" eller "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2985">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2986">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2986">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2987">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2987">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2988">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2989">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2989">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2990">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2991">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2991">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2992">Funktionen hittar  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2992">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2993">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2993">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2994">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2994">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-2995">Funktionen hittar  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-2995">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3023">Tjeckiska körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3023">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3024">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3025">Två bokstäver följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3025">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3026">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3027">Åtta bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3027">eight letters and digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3028">bokstaven "E" (inte den är det.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3028">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3029">en bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3029">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3030">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3030">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3031">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3032">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3033">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3033">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3034">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3035">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3035">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3036">Det reguljära  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3036">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3037">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3037">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3163">Tjeckiska passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3163">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3164">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3165">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3165">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3166">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3167">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3167">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3168">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3169">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3169">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3170">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3171">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3171">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3172">Det reguljära  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3172">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3173">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3173">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3174">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3174">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3175">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3176">Det reguljära  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3176">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3177">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3199">Tjeckiska personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3199">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3200">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3201">Nio siffror med valfritt snedstreck (gammalt format) 10 siffror med valfritt snedstreck (nytt format)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3201">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3202">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3203">Nio siffror (gammalt format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3203">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3204">Sex siffror som representerar födelsedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3204">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3205">ett valfritt snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3205">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3206">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3206">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3207">10 siffror (nytt format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3207">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3208">Sex siffror som representerar födelsedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3208">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3209">ett valfritt snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3209">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3210">fyra siffror där sista siffran är en bård</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3210">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3211">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3212">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3213">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3214">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3214">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3215">Funktionen för Func_czech_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3215">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3216">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_czech_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3216">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3217">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3218">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3218">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3219">Funktionen Func_czech_id_card_new_format hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3219">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3220">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3267">Danmarks körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3267">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3268">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3269">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3269">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3270">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3271">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3271">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3272">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3273">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3273">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3274">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3275">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3275">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3276">Det reguljära  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3276">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3277">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3277">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3401">Danmark passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3401">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3402">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3403">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3403">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3404">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3405">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3405">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3406">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3407">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3407">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3408">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3409">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3409">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3410">Det reguljära  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3410">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3411">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3411">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3412">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date2` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD MM YY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3412">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3413">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3413">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3414">Det reguljära  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3414">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3415">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3415">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3435">Danmarks personliga ID-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3435">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3436">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3436">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3437">10 siffror som innehåller ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3437">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3438">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3439">10 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3439">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3440">Sex siffror i formatet DDMMYY, som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3440">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3441">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3441">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3442">fyra siffror där den sista siffran är en bård</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3442">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3443">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3444">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3445">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3446">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3446">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3447">Det reguljära uttrycket Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3447">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3448">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_denmark_id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3448">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3449">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3449">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3450">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3450">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3451">Det reguljära uttrycket Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3451">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3452">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3452">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
    <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3453">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3453">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3455">centrale personregister</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3455">centrale personregister</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3456">civilt registreringssystem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3456">civilt registreringssystem</span></span>
