## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3524">Dea-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3524">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3525">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3526">Två bokstäver följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3526">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3527">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3528">Mönster måste omfatta alla följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3528">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3529">en bokstav (inte den här uppsättning möjliga bokstäver) från den här uppsättningen möjliga bokstäver: abcdefghjklmnprstux, som är en registrantkod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3529">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3530">en bokstav (inte fallkänslig), som är den första bokstaven i registrantens efternamn eller siffran "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3530">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3531">sju siffror, den sista är bårdsiffran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3531">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3532">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3533">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3533">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3534">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3535">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3535">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3536">Funktionen Func_dea_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3536">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3537">Ett nyckelord `Keyword_dea_number` från hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3537">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3538">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3538">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3539">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3540">Funktionen Func_dea_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3540">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3541">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3541">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3542">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3542">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3543">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3543">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3544">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3544">dea</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3546">efterlevnadsadministration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3546">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3547">tvingande agentur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3547">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3548">Estlands körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3548">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3549">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3550">Två bokstäver följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3550">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3551">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3552">Två bokstäver och sex siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3552">two letters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3553">bokstäverna "ET" (inte case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3553">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3554">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3554">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3555">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3556">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3556">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3557">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3558">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3558">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3559">Det reguljära  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3559">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3560">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3560">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3686">Estland – personidentifieringskod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3686">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3687">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3687">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3688">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3688">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3689">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3689">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3690">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3690">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3691">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3691">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3692">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3692">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3693">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3694">11 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3694">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3695">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3696">11 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3696">11 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3697">en siffra som motsvarar sex och ett sekel (udda nummer man, jämn kvinna; 1–2: 19:e talet; 3–4: 20:e talet; 5–6: 2000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3697">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3698">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet (DSMMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3698">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3699">Tre siffror som motsvarar ett serienummer som separerar personer som föds samma datum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3699">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3700">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3700">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3701">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3702">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3702">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3703">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3704">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3704">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3705">Funktionen hittar  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3705">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3706">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3706">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3707">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3707">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3708">Funktionen hittar  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3708">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3741">Estland passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3741">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3742">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3742">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3743">en bokstav följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3743">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3744">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3744">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3745">en bokstav följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3745">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3746">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3747">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3747">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3748">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3749">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3749">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3750">Det reguljära  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3750">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3751">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3751">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3752">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3752">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3753">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3753">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3754">Det reguljära  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3754">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3755">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3755">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3773">BETALKORTSNUMMER (EU)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3773">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3774">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3775">16 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3775">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3776">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3777">Komplext och robust mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3777">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3778">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3779">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3779">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3780">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3781">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3781">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3782">Funktionen för Func_eu_debit_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3782">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3783">Minst ett av följande stämmer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3783">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3784">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_eu_debit_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3784">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3785">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_card_terms_dict hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3785">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3786">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_card_security_terms_dict hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3786">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3787">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3787">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3788">Funktionen Func_expiration_date hittar ett datum i rätt datumformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3788">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-3789">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-3789">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4236">Finlands körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4236">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4237">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4238">10 siffror som innehåller ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4238">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4239">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4240">10 siffror som innehåller ett bindestreck:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4240">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4241">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4241">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4242">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4242">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4243">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4243">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4244">en siffra eller bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4244">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4245">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4246">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4246">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4247">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4248">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4248">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4249">Det reguljära  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4249">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4250">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4250">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4381">Finlands hälsoförsäkringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4381">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4382">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4382">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4383">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4383">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4384">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4384">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4385">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4385">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4386">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4386">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4387">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4387">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4388">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4389">20-siffrigt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4389">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4390">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4391">20-siffrigt nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4391">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4392">10 siffror – 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4392">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4393">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4393">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4394">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4394">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4395">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4396">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4396">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4397">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4398">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4399">Regex-Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4399">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4400">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4400">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4418">Finlands national-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4418">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4419">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4419">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4420">Sex siffror plus ett tecken som anger ett sekel plus tre siffror plus en bård</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4420">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4421">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4421">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4422">Mönster måste omfatta alla följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4422">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4423">Sex siffror i formatet DDMMYY, som är ett födelsedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4423">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4424">talmarkör (antingen '-', '+' eller 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4424">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4425">tresiffrigt id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4425">three-digit personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4426">En siffra eller bokstav (tecken insensitiv) som är en kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4426">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4427">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4427">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4428">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4428">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4429">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4429">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4430">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4430">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4431">funktionen som Func_finnish_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4431">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4432">ett nyckelord från Keyword_finnish_national_id hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4432">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4433">kontrollsumma passeras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4433">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4434">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4434">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4435">funktionen som Func_finnish_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4435">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4436">kontrollsumma passeras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4436">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4485">Finland passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4485">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4486">Den här entiteten är tillgänglig i typen känslig information av EU-passnummer och är tillgänglig som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4486">This entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4487">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4487">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4488">kombination av nio bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4488">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4489">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4489">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4490">kombination av nio bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4490">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4491">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4491">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4492">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4492">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4493">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4494">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4494">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4495">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4496">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4496">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4497">Det reguljära `Regex_finland_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4497">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4498">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keyword_finland_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4498">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4499">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4499">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4500">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4501">Det reguljära `Regex_finland_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4501">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4502">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keyword_finland_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4502">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4526">Frankrikes körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4526">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4527">Den här enheten är tillgänglig i EU-drivrutinens informationstyp Licensnummerkänslig information och är tillgänglig som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4527">This entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4528">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4528">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4529">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4529">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4530">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4530">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4531">12 siffror med validering för rabatt på liknande mönster som franska telefonnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4531">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4532">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4533">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4533">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4534">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4535">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4535">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4536">funktionen Func_french_drivers_license hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4536">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4537">ett nyckelord från Keyword_french_drivers_license hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4537">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4674">21-siffrigt nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4674">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4675">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4675">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4676">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4676">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4677">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4677">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4678">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4678">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4679">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4679">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4680">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4681">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4681">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4682">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4683">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4683">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4684">regex-Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4684">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4685">ett nyckelord från Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4685">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4687">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4687">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4688">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4688">insurance card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4690">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4690">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4691">France national id card (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4691">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4692">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4693">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4693">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4694">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4695">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4695">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4696">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4697">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4697">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4698">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4699">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4699">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4700">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_france_cni hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4700">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4701">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4701">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4702">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4702">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4703">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4703">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4708">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4708">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4709">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4709">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4710">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4710">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4711">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4711">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4712">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4712">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4713">numéro d'assurance malakit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4713">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4715">Frankrike passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4715">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4716">Den här entiteten är tillgänglig i typen Känslig information av eu-passnummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4716">This entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4717">Det är också tillgängligt som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4717">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4718">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4719">Nio siffror och bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4719">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4720">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4721">Nio siffror och bokstäver:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4721">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4722">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4722">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4723">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4723">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4724">fem siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4724">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4725">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4726">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4726">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4727">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4728">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4729">Funktionen hittar `Func_fr_passport` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4729">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4730">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4730">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4731">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date3` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD MM YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4731">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4732">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4732">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4733">Funktionen hittar `Func_fr_passport` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4733">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4734">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4734">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4753">passeportnon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4753">passeportnon</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4765">Frankrikes personnummer (INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4765">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4766">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4767">15 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4767">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4768">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4769">Måste matcha ett av två mönster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4769">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4770">13 siffror följt av ett blanksteg följt av två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4770">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4771">eller</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4771">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4772">15 siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4772">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4773">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4774">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4774">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4775">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4776">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4776">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4777">Funktionen hittar `Func_french_insee` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4777">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4778">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_fr_insee hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4778">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4779">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4780">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4780">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4781">Funktionen Func_french_insee eller Func_fr_insee hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4781">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4782">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4782">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4813">Frankrikes skattenummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4813">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4814">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4815">13 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4815">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4816">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4817">13 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4817">13 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4818">En siffra som måste vara 0, 1, 2 eller 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4818">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4819">En siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4819">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4820">Ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4820">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4821">Två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4821">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4822">Ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4822">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4823">Tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4823">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4824">Ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4824">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4825">Tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4825">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4826">Ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4826">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4827">Tre kontrollsiffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4827">Three check digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4828">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4829">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4830">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4831">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4831">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4832">Funktionen hittar  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4832">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4833">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4833">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4834">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4834">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4835">Funktionen hittar  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4835">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4837">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4837">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4838">numéro d'identification fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4838">numéro d'identification fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4839">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4839">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4840">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4840">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4841">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4841">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4842">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4842">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4843">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4843">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4844">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4844">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4845">skatteregistreringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4845">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4846">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4846">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4847">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4847">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4848">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4848">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4849">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4849">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4850">räknare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4850">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4851">räknare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4851">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4852">tin-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4852">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4853">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4853">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4854">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4854">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4855">Värdeskattenummer för Frankrike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4855">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4856">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4856">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4857">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4857">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4858">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4858">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4859">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4859">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4860">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4860">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4861">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4861">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4862">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4863">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 13 tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4863">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4864">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4865">13 tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4865">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4866">två bokstäver – FR (teckenkänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4866">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4867">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4867">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4868">två bokstäver eller siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4868">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4869">Ett valfritt blanksteg, punkt, bindestreck eller kommatecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4869">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4870">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4870">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4871">Ett valfritt blanksteg, punkt, bindestreck eller kommatecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4871">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4872">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4872">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4873">Ett valfritt blanksteg, punkt, bindestreck eller kommatecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4873">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4874">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4874">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4875">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4875">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4876">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4876">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4877">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4877">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4878">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4878">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4879">Funktionen för Func_france_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4879">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4880">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4880">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4881">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4881">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4882">Funktionen för Func_france_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4882">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4883">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4883">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4884">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4884">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4885">momsregistreringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4885">vat number</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4895">Tysklands körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4895">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4896">Den här typen av känslig information ingår i EU:s typ av licensnummer för känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4896">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4897">Det är också tillgängligt som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4897">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4898">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4898">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4899">kombination av 11 siffror och bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4899">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4900">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4900">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4901">11 siffror och bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4901">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4902">en siffra eller bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4902">a digit or letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4903">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4903">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4904">Sex siffror eller bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4904">six digits or letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4905">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4905">a digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4906">en siffra eller bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4906">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4907">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4908">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4908">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4909">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4910">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4911">Funktionen för Func_german_drivers_license hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4911">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4912">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_german_drivers_license_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4912">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-4913">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-4913">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5062">Identitetskortsnummer i Tyskland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5062">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5063">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5064">sedan 1 november 2010: nio bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5064">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5065">från 1 april 1987 till 31 oktober 2010: 10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5065">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5066">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5067">sedan 1 november 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5067">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5068">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5068">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5069">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5069">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5070">från den 1 april 1987 till den 31 oktober 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5070">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5071">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5071">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5072">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5073">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5073">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5074">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5075">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5075">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5076">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_germany_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5076">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5077">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_germany_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5077">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
