- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5092">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5092">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5093">Tyskland passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5093">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5094">Den här entiteten ingår i typen KÄNSLIG information av EU-passnummer och är tillgänglig som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5094">This entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5095">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5096">10 siffror eller bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5096">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5097">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5097">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5098">Mönster måste omfatta alla följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5098">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5099">det första tecknet är en siffra eller en bokstav från denna uppsättning (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5099">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5100">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5100">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5101">Fem siffror eller bokstäver från denna uppsättning (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5101">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5102">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5102">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5103">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5104">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5104">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5105">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5106">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5106">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5107">Funktionen för Func_german_passport hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5107">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5108">Ett nyckelord från `Keyword_german_passport` eller `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5108">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5109">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5109">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5110">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5110">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5111">Funktionen för Func_german_passport_data hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5111">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5112">Ett nyckelord från `Keyword_german_passport` eller `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5112">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5113">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5113">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5124">passeport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5124">passeport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5126">pass #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5126">passport#</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5136">Tysklands skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5136">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5137">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5138">11 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5138">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5139">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5140">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5140">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5141">Två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5141">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5142">Ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5142">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5143">Tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5143">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5144">Ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5144">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5145">Tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5145">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5146">Ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5146">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5147">Två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5147">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5148">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5148">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5149">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5150">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5150">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5151">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5152">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5152">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5153">Funktionen hittar  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5153">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5154">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5154">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5155">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5155">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5156">Funktionen hittar  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5156">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5182">Momsnummer för Tyskland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5182">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5183">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5183">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5184">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5184">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5185">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5185">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5186">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5186">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5187">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5187">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5188">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5188">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5189">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5189">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5190">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 11 tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5190">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5191">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5191">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5192">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 11 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5192">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5193">a bokstaven D eller d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5193">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5194">ett bokstaven E eller e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5194">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5195">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5195">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5196">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5196">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5197">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller kommatecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5197">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5198">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5198">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5199">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller kommatecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5199">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5200">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5200">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5201">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5202">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5203">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5204">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5205">Funktionen för Func_germany_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5205">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5206">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5206">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5207">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5208">Funktionen för Func_germany_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5208">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5209">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5209">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5210">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5210">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5215">han/hon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5215">mwst</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5217">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5217">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5218">Greklands körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5218">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5219">Den här enheten ingår i EU:s informationstyp Licensnummerkänslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5219">This entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5220">Det är också tillgängligt som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5220">It is also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5221">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5222">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5222">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5223">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5224">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5224">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5225">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5225">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5226">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5226">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5227">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5227">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5228">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5228">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5229">Det reguljära  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5229">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5230">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5230">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5231">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5231">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5232">Keywords_eu_driver är s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5232">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5356">Greklands nationella ID-kort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5356">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5357">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5358">Kombination av 7–8 bokstäver och siffror plus ett streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5358">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5359">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5360">Sju bokstäver och siffror (gammalt format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5360">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5361">En bokstav (valfri bokstav i det grekiska alfabetet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5361">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5362">Ett streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5362">A dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5363">Sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5363">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5364">Åtta bokstäver och siffror (nytt format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5364">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5365">Två bokstäver med versaler både i det grekiska och det latinska alfabetet (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5365">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5366">Ett streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5366">A dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5367">Sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5367">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5368">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5369">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5369">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5370">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5370">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5371">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5372">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_greece_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5372">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5373">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_greece_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5373">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5374">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5374">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5375">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_greece_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5375">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5376">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5376">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5377">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5377">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5378">grekiska id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5378">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5379">grekiska national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5379">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5380">grekiska personliga ID-kort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5380">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5381">grekiska police id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5381">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5382">identitetskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5382">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5383">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5383">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5384">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5384">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5385">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5385">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5386">Greklands passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5386">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5388">Två bokstäver följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5388">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5389">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5390">Två bokstäver följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5390">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5391">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5392">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5392">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5393">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5394">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5395">Det reguljära  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5395">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5396">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5397">Det reguljära uttrycket hittar datum i `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` formatet DD MMM YY (Exempel - 28 augusti 19) eller ett `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` nyckelord från hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5397">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5398">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5399">Det reguljära  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5399">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5400">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5401">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5401">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5402">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5402">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5404">pass #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5404">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5405">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5405">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5406">pass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5406">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5407">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5407">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5408">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5408">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5409">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5409">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5410">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5410">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5411">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5411">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5412">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5412">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5413">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5413">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5414">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5414">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5415">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5415">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5416">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5416">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5417">Greklands social securitynummer (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5417">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5418">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5418">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5419">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5419">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5420">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5420">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5421">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5421">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5422">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5422">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5423">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5423">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5424">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5425">11 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5425">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5426">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5426">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5427">Sex siffror som födelsedatumMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5427">Six digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5428">Fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5428">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5429">en kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5429">a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5430">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5430">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5431">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5431">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5432">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5432">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5433">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5433">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5434">Funktionen hittar  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5434">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5435">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5435">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5436">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5437">Funktionen hittar  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5437">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5438">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5438">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5439">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5439">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5443">socialsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5443">socialsecurityno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5445">amka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5445">amka</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5447">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5447">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5448">Greklands skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5448">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5449">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5449">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5450">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5450">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5451">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5451">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5452">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5452">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5453">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5453">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5454">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5454">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5455">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5456">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5456">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5457">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5458">Nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5458">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5459">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5460">Ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5460">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5461">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5462">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5462">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5463">Det reguljära  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5463">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5464">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5464">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5493">Hongkong identitetskort (HKID) nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5493">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5494">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5495">Kombination av 8–9 bokstäver och siffror samt valfria parenteser runt det sista tecknet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5495">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5496">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5497">Kombination av 8–9 bokstäver:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5497">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5498">1–2 bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5498">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5499">Sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5499">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5500">Det sista tecknet (valfri siffra eller bokstaven A), som är en kontrollsiffra och som kan omges av parenteser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5500">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5501">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5502">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5502">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5503">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5504">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5504">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5505">Funktionen för Func_hong_kong_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5505">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5506">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_hong_kong_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5506">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5507">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5507">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5508">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5508">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5509">Funktionen för Func_hong_kong_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5509">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5510">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5510">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5550">Ungerns körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5550">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5551">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5552">Två bokstäver följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5552">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5553">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5554">Två bokstäver och sex siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5554">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5555">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5555">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5556">Sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5556">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5557">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5558">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5558">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5559">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5560">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5560">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5561">Det reguljära  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5561">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5562">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5562">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5696">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5697">11 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5697">11 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5698">En siffra som motsvarar kön, 1 för man, 2 för kvinna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5698">One digit that corresponds to gender, 1 for male, 2 for female.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5699">Andra siffror är också möjliga för personer som föddes före 1900 eller för personer med dubbel detknubb.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5699">Other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5700">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatum (AMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5700">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5701">Tre siffror som motsvarar ett serienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5701">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5702">En kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5702">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5703">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5704">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5704">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5705">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5706">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5707">Funktionen hittar  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5707">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5708">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5708">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5709">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5710">Funktionen hittar  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5710">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5711">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5711">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5713">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5713">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5714">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5714">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5715">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5715">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5716">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5716">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5717">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5717">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5718">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5718">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5719">személyazonosító igamévány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5719">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5720">személyi igaávány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5720">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5721">Ungern passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5721">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5722">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5723">Två bokstäver följt av sex eller sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5723">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5724">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5725">Två bokstäver följt av sex eller sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5725">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5726">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5727">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5727">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5728">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5729">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5730">Det reguljära  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5730">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5731">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5732">Det reguljära uttrycket hittar datum i `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` formatet DD MMM/MMM YY (Exempel - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5732">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5733">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5734">Det reguljära  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5734">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5735">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5749">útleúl száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5749">útlevél száma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5750">Útlevelek száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5750">Útlevelek száma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5751">útleúl szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5751">útlevél szám</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5752">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5752">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5753">utfärdandedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5753">date of issue</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5755">Ungerns social security number (TAJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5755">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5757">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5757">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5758">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5759">Nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5759">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5760">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5761">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5761">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5762">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5763">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5764">Funktionen hittar  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5764">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5765">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5765">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5766">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5767">Funktionen hittar  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5787">Ungerns skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5787">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5788">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5788">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5789">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5789">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5790">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5790">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5791">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5791">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5792">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5792">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5793">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5793">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5794">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5795">10 siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5795">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5796">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5797">10 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5797">10 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5798">En siffra som måste vara "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5798">One digit that must be "8"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5799">Åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5799">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5800">En kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5800">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5801">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5802">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5802">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5803">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5804">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5805">Funktionen hittar  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5805">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5806">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5806">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5807">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5808">Funktionen hittar  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5834">Nummer för moms i Ungern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5834">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5835">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5836">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5837">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5838">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5839">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5840">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5841">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5842">10 tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5842">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5843">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5844">10 tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5844">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5845">två bokstäver – HU eller hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5845">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5846">valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5846">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5847">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5847">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5848">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5849">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5849">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5850">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5851">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5851">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5852">Funktionen Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5852">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5853">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5853">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5854">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5854">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5855">Funktionen Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5868">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5868">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5869">Indiens permanenta kontonummer (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5869">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5870">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5871">10 bokstäver eller siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5871">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5872">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5873">10 bokstäver eller siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5873">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5874">Tre bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5874">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5875">En bokstav i C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (inte ärendekänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5875">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5876">En bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5876">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5877">Fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5877">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5878">En bokstav med en alfabetisk kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5878">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5879">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5880">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5881">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5882">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5882">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5883">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_india_permanent_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5883">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5884">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_india_permanent_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5884">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5885">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5885">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5886">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_india_permanent_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5887">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5887">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>
