## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5891">Indiens unika ID-nummer (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5892">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5893">12 siffror som innehåller valfria blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5893">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5894">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5895">12 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5895">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5896">En siffra som inte är 0 eller 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5896">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5897">Tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5897">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5898">Ett blanksteg eller streck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5898">An optional space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5899">Fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5899">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5900">Ett blanksteg eller streck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5900">An optional space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5901">Den sista siffran, som är kontrollsiffran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5901">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5902">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5903">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5903">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5904">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5905">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5905">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5906">Funktionen för Func_india_aadhaar hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5906">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5907">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_india_aadhar hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5907">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5908">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5908">The checksum passes.</span></span>
-
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5909">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5910">Funktionen för Func_india_aadhaar hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5910">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5911">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5920">Indonesia Identity Card-nummer (KTP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5920">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5921">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5922">16 siffror med valfria punkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5922">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5923">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5924">16 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5924">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5925">Tvåsiffrig provinskod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5925">Two-digit province code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5926">En punkt (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5926">A period (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5927">Tvåsiffrig regency eller ortkod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5927">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5928">Tvåsiffrig underpriskod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5928">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5929">En punkt (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5929">A period (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5930">Sex siffror i formatet DDMMYY, som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5930">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5931">En punkt (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5931">A period (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5932">Fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5932">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5933">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5934">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5935">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5936">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5936">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5937">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_indonesia_id_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5937">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5938">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_indonesia_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5938">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5939">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5939">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5941">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5941">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span>

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5944">Nummer för internationella banktjänster (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5944">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5945">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5946">Landskod (två bokstäver) plus kontrollera siffror (två siffror) plus bban-nummer (upp till 30 tecken)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5946">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5947">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5948">Mönster måste omfatta alla följande:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5948">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5949">Landskod med två bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5949">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5950">Två kontrollsiffror (följt av ett valfritt blanksteg)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5950">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5951">1–7 grupper med fyra bokstäver eller siffror (kan avgränsas med blanksteg)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5951">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5952">1–3 bokstäver eller siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5952">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5953">Formatet skiljer sig åt mellan olika länder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5953">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-5954">IBAN-typen för känslig information omfattar dessa 60 länder:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-5954">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6016">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6016">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6017">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6018">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6018">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6019">Funktionen Func_iban hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6019">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6020">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6020">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml

</Entity>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6029">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6029">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6031">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6031">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6033">Ett nyckelord från Dictionary_icd_10_codes hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6033">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6059">IP-adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6059">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6060">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6060">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6061">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6061">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6062">Komplext mönster som konton för formaterade (punkter) och oformaterade (inga perioder) versioner av IPv4-adresser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6062">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6063">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6063">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6064">Komplext mönster som står för formaterade IPv6-tal (som innehåller kolon)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6064">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6065">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6065">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6066">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6067">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6067">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6068">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6069">För IPv6 har en DLP-princip med hög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6069">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6070">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_ipv6_address hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6070">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6071">Inget nyckelord från Keyword_ipaddress hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6071">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6072">För IPv4 har en DLP-princip med hög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6072">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6073">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_ipv4_address hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6073">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6074">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_ipaddress hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6074">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6075">För IPv6 har en DLP-princip med hög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6075">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6076">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_ipv6_address hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6076">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6077">Inget nyckelord från Keyword_ipaddress hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6077">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6085">Irlands körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6085">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6086">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6087">Sex siffror följt av fyra bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6087">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6088">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6089">Sex siffror och fyra bokstäver:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6089">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6090">Sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6090">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6092">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6093">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6093">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6094">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6095">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6095">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6096">Det reguljära  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6096">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6220">ceadúnais tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6220">ceadúnais tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6221">Irland, passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6221">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6222">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6223">Två bokstäver eller siffror följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6223">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6224">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6225">Två bokstäver eller siffror följt av sju siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6225">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6226">Två siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6226">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6227">Sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6227">Seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6228">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6229">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6229">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6230">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6231">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6231">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6232">Det reguljära  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6232">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6233">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6233">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6234">Det reguljära uttrycket hittar datum i formatet `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Exempel - 01 BEA/MAJ 1988) eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6234">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6235">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6235">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6236">Det reguljära  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6236">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6237">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6237">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6261">PpS-nummer (Personal Public Service) för Irland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6261">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6262">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6262">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6263">Gammalt format (till 31 december 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6263">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6264">sju siffror följt av 1–2 bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6264">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6265">Nytt format (1 januari 2013 och senare):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6265">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6266">sju siffror följt av två bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6266">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6267">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6268">Gammalt format (till 31 december 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6268">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6269">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6269">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6270">En till två bokstäver (inte teckenkänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6270">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6271">Nytt format (1 januari 2013 och senare):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6271">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6272">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6272">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6273">En bokstav (inte en teckenkänslig) som är en alfabetisk kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6273">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6274">En valfri bokstav i cellområdet A-I eller "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6274">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6275">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6276">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6276">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6277">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6278">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6278">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6279">Funktionen för Func_ireland_pps hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6279">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6280">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6280">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6281">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6281">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6282">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6282">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6283">Funktionen för Func_ireland_pps hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6283">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6284">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6284">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6329">Bankkontonummer för Israel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6329">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6330">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6331">13 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6331">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6332">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6333">Formaterat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6333">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6334">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6334">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6335">ett streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6335">a dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6336">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6336">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6337">ett streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6337">a dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6338">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6338">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6339">Oformaterat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6339">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6340">13 siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6340">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6341">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6342">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6343">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6344">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6345">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_israel_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6345">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6346">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_israel_bank_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6346">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6353">Israels national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6353">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6354">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6355">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6355">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6356">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6357">nio siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6357">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6358">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6359">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6359">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6360">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6361">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6361">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6362">Funktionen för Func_israeli_national_id_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6362">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6363">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Israel_National_ID hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6363">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6364">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6364">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6383">Italiens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6383">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6384">Den här typen av entitet ingår i EU-drivrutinens informationstyp Licensnummerkänslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6384">This type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6385">Det är också tillgängligt som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6385">It is also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6386">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6387">en kombination av 10 bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6387">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6388">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6389">en kombination av 10 bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6389">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6390">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6390">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6391">bokstaven "A" eller "V" (inte ärendekänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6391">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6392">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6392">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6393">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6393">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6394">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6395">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6396">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6397">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6398">Det reguljära `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6398">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6399">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6399">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6526">Italiens räkenskapskod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6526">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6527">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6527">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6528">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6528">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6529">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6529">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6530">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6530">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6531">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6531">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6532">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6532">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6533">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6533">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6534">En kombination av bokstäver och siffror på 16 tecken i det angivna mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6534">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6535">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6535">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6536">En kombination av 16 tecken och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6536">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6537">Tre bokstäver som motsvarar de tre första konsonanterna i familjenamnet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6537">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6538">Tre bokstäver som motsvarar den första, tredje och fjärde konsonanterna i förnamnet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6538">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6539">två siffror som motsvarar de sista siffrorna i födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6539">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6540">en bokstav som motsvarar bokstaven för födelsedatumet – bokstäver används i alfabetisk ordning, men bara bokstäverna A till E, H, L, M, P, R till T används (så januari är A och oktober är R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6540">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6541">Två siffror som motsvarar dagen i månaden för att skilja mellan könen läggs 40 till vid födelsedatumet för kvinnor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6541">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6542">fyra siffror som motsvarar den specifika areakoden för den valuta som personen är föds på (landskoder används för externa länder)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6542">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6543">en paritetssiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6543">one parity digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6544">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6545">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6545">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6546">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6547">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6547">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6548">Funktionen hittar  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6548">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6549">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6549">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6550">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6550">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6551">Funktionen hittar  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6551">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6584">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6584">tin no</span></span>

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6586">Italien passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6586">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6587">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6588">två bokstäver eller siffror följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6588">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6589">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6590">Två bokstäver eller siffror följt av sju siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6590">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6591">två siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6591">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6592">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6592">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6593">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6593">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6594">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6594">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6595">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6595">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6596">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6596">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6597">Det reguljära  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6597">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6598">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6598">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6599">Det reguljära uttrycket hittar datum i formatet `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Exempel - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6599">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6600">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6600">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6601">Det reguljära  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6601">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6602">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6608">pass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6608">passports</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6615">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6615">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6616">italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6616">italiana passaporto</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6626">Momsnummer i Italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6626">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6627">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6627">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6628">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6628">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6629">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6629">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6630">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6630">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6631">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6631">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6632">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6632">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6633">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6633">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6634">13 tecken för alfanumeriska mönster med valfria avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6634">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6635">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6635">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6636">13 tecken med alfanumeriska mönster med valfria avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6636">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6637">I eller i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6637">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6638">T eller t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6638">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6639">Valfritt blanksteg, punkt, bindestreck eller kommatecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6639">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6640">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6640">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6641">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6642">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6642">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6643">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6644">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6644">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6645">Funktionen Func_italy_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6645">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6646">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6646">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6647">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6647">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6648">Funktionen Func_italy_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6648">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6649">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6649">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6650">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6650">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6656">Bankkontonummer för Japan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6656">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6657">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6658">sju eller åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6658">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6659">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6660">bankkontonummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6660">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6661">sju eller åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6661">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6662">bankkontokontorskod:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6662">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6663">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6663">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6664">Blanksteg eller streck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6664">a space or dash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6665">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6665">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6666">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6667">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6667">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6668">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6669">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6669">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6670">Funktionen Func_jp_bank_account hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6670">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6671">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_bank_account hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6671">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6672">Något av följande är sant:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6672">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6673">Funktionen för Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6673">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6674">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6674">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6675">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6676">Funktionen Func_jp_bank_account hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6676">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6677">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_bank_account hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6677">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6678">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6678">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_bank_account"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6679">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6679">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6680">Checking Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6680">Checking Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6724">Japans körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6724">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6725">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6726">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6726">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6727">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6728">12 siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6728">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6729">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6730">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6730">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6731">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6732">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6732">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6733">Funktionen Func_jp_drivers_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6733">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6734">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6734">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6772">Japan, mitt nummer – företag</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6772">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6773">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6773">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6774">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6774">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6775">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6775">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6776">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6776">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6777">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6777">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6778">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6778">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6779">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6780">13-siffrigt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6780">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6781">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6782">13-siffrigt nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6782">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6783">en siffra från en till nio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6783">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6784">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6784">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6785">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6786">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6786">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6787">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6788">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6788">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6789">Funktionen Func_japanese_my_number_corporate hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6789">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6790">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6790">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6791">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6791">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6792">Funktionen Func_japanese_my_number_corporate hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6792">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6793">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6793">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6794">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6794">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6795">företagsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6795">corporate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6796">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6796">マイナンバー</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6805">Japan, mitt nummer – privat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6805">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6806">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6806">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6807">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6807">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6808">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6808">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6809">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6809">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6810">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6810">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6811">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6811">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6812">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6813">12-siffrigt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6813">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6814">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6815">12-siffrigt nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6815">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6816">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6816">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6817">Ett valfritt blanksteg, punkt eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6817">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6818">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6818">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6819">Ett valfritt blanksteg, punkt eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6819">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6820">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6820">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6821">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6822">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6822">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6823">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6824">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6824">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6825">Funktionen för Func_japanese_my_number_personal hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6825">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6826">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6826">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6827">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6827">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6828">Funktionen för Func_japanese_my_number_personal hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6828">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6835">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6835">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6836">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6836">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6837">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6837">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6838">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6838">個人識別番号</span></span>
