## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6841">Japan passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6841">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6842">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6843">Två bokstäver följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6843">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6844">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6845">Två bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga) följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6845">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6846">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6847">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6848">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6849">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6850">Funktionen för Func_jp_passport hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6850">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6851">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_passport hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6851">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6868">Japan residence card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6868">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6869">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6870">12 bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6870">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6871">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6871">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6872">12 bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6872">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6873">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6873">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6874">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6874">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6875">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6875">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6876">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6877">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6877">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6878">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6879">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6880">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_jp_residence_card_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6880">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6881">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_residence_card_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6881">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6882">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6882">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6884">Residence card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6884">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6885">Residence card no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6885">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6886">Residence card #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6886">Residence card #</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6890">Registreringsnummer för boende i Japan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6890">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6891">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6891">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6892">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6892">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6893">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6893">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6894">11 siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6894">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6895">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6895">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6896">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6896">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6897">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6897">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6898">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6898">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6899">Funktionen för Func_jp_resident_registration_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6899">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6900">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6900">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6901">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6901">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6913">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6913">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6914">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6915">7-12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6915">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6916">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6917">7-12 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6917">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6918">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6918">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6919">Ett bindestreck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6919">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6920">sex siffror ELLER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6920">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6921">7–12 siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6921">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6922">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6923">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6923">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6924">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6925">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6925">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6926">Funktionen för Func_jp_sin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6926">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6927">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_sin hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6927">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6928">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6929">Funktionen för Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6929">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6930">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_jp_sin hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6930">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6949">厚生年金</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6949">厚生年金</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6951">Lettiska körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6951">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6952">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6953">Tre bokstäver följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6953">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6954">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6955">tre bokstäver och sex siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6955">three letters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6956">Tre bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6956">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6957">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6957">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6958">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6958">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6959">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6959">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6960">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6960">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6961">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6961">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6962">Det reguljära  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6962">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-6963">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-6963">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7088">Personlig kod för Lettland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7088">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7089">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7089">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7090">11 siffror och ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7090">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7091">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7091">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7092">Gammalt format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7092">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7093">11 siffror och ett bindestreck:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7093">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7094">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7094">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7095">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7095">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7096">en siffra som motsvarar födelsedatumet ("0" för 19:e talet, "1" för 20:e talet och "2" för 2000-talet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7096">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7097">fyra siffror, slumpmässigt genererade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7097">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7098">Nytt format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7098">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7099">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7099">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7100">Två siffror "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7100">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7101">Nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7101">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7102">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7102">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7103">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7103">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7104">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7104">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7105">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7105">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7106">Funktionen eller  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex hittar `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7106">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7107">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7107">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7108">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7108">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7109">Funktionen eller  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex hittar `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7109">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7172">Lettiska passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7172">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7173">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7174">två bokstäver eller siffror följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7174">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7175">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7176">Två bokstäver eller siffror följt av sju siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7176">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7177">två siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7177">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7178">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7178">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7179">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7180">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7180">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7181">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7182">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7182">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7183">Det reguljära  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7183">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7184">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7184">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7185">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7185">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7186">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7187">Det reguljära  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7187">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7188">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7188">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7211">Litauens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7211">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7212">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7213">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7213">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7214">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7215">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7215">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7216">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7217">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7217">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7218">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7219">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7219">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7220">Det reguljära  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7220">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7221">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7221">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7346">Personlig kod för Litauen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7346">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7347">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7347">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7348">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7348">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7349">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7349">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7350">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7350">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7351">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7351">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7352">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7352">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7353">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7354">11 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7354">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7355">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7356">11 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7356">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7357">en siffra (1–6) som motsvarar personens kön och födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7357">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7358">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatum (AMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7358">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7359">Tre siffror som motsvarar serienumret för födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7359">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7360">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7360">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7361">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7362">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7362">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7363">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7364">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7365">Funktionen hittar  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7365">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7366">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7366">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7367">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7367">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7368">Funktionen hittar  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7368">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7403">Litauen passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7403">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7404">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7405">åtta siffror eller bokstäver utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7405">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7406">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7407">åtta siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7407">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7408">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7409">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7409">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7410">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7411">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7412">Det reguljära  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7412">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7413">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7414">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date3` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD MM YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7415">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7416">Det reguljära  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7416">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7417">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7437">Luxemburgs körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7437">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7438">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7439">Sex siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7439">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7440">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7441">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7441">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7442">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7443">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7443">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7444">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7445">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7446">Det reguljära  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7446">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7447">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7447">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7571">Luxemburgs national identification number (natural persons)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7571">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7572">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7572">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7573">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7573">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7574">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7574">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7575">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7575">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7576">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7576">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7577">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7577">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7578">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7579">13 siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7579">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7580">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7580">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7581">13 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7581">13 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7582">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7582">11 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7583">två kontrollsiffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7583">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7584">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7585">ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7585">yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7586">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7587">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7587">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7588">Funktionen hittar  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7588">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7589">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7589">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7590">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7590">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7591">Funktionen hittar  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7591">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7614">Luxemburg-passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7614">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7615">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7615">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7616">åtta siffror eller bokstäver utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7616">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7617">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7617">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7618">åtta siffror eller bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7618">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7619">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7620">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7620">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7621">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7622">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7622">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7623">Det reguljära  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7623">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7624">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7624">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7625">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date3` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD MM YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7625">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7626">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7626">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7627">Det reguljära  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7627">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7628">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7628">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7660">Luxemburgs national identification number (icke-naturliga personer)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7660">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7662">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7662">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7663">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7664">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7664">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7665">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7666">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7666">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7667">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7667">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7668">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7669">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7669">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7670">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7670">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7671">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7671">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7672">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7672">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7673">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7674">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7674">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7675">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7676">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7676">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7677">Funktionen hittar  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7677">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7678">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7678">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7679">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7679">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7680">Funktionen hittar  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7680">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7720">Malaysia identification card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7720">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7721">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7722">12 siffror med valfria bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7722">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7723">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7724">12 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7724">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7725">Sex siffror i formatet YYMMDD, som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7725">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7726">Ett streck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7726">a dash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7727">plats-av-födelsedatum med två bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7727">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7728">Ett streck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7728">a dash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7729">tre slumpmässiga siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7729">three random digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7730">ensiffrig kön-kod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7730">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7731">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7732">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7732">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7733">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7734">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7735">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_malaysia_id_card_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7735">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7736">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7736">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7763">Maltas körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7763">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7765">Kombination av två tecken och sex siffror i det angivna mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7765">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7766">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7767">kombination av två tecken och sex siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7767">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7768">Två tecken (siffror eller bokstäver, inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7768">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7769">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7769">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7770">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7770">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7771">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7771">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7772">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7772">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7773">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7774">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7775">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7776">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7777">Det reguljära  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7777">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7778">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7778">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7902">Malta-identitetskortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7902">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7903">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7903">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7904">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7904">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7905">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7905">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7906">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7906">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7907">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7907">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7908">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7908">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7909">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7910">sju siffror följt av en bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7910">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7911">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7912">sju siffror följt av en bokstav:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7912">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7913">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7913">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7914">en bokstav i "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (ärendekänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7914">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7915">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7916">Ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7916">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7917">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7918">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7918">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7919">Det reguljära  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7919">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7920">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7920">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7921">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7921">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7922">Det reguljära  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7922">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7928">kodilisi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7928">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7931">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7931">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7933">numru tas-servizz taë-ëittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7933">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7934">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7934">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7939">Malta passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7939">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7940">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7941">sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7941">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7942">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7943">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7943">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7944">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7945">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7946">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7947">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7948">Det reguljära  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7948">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7949">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7949">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7950">Ett nyckelord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` från hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7950">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7951">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7951">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7952">Det reguljära  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7952">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7953">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7953">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7973">Maltas skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7973">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7974">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7975">För Maltesiska:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7975">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7976">sju siffror och en bokstav i det angivna mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7976">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7977">Non-Denesiska ochesiska enheter:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7977">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7978">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7978">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7979">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7980">Esiska: sju siffror och en bokstav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7980">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7981">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7981">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7982">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7982">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7983">Non-Denesiska och enheter av senesiska: nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7983">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7984">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7984">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7985">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7985">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7986">Ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7986">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7987">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7987">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7988">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7988">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7989">Regex eller  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  hittar innehåll som matchar `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7989">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7990">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7990">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7991">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7991">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7992">Regex eller  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` hittar innehåll som matchar `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7992">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
