- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7998">kodilisi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7998">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-7999">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-7999">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8000">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8000">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8001">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8001">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8002">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8002">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8003">numru tas-servizz taë-ëittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8003">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8004">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8004">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8005">personlig numerisk kod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8005">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8006">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8006">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8007">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8007">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8008">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8008">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8009">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8009">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8025">MBI-kort (Identifier Identifier)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8025">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8026">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8027">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 11 tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8027">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8028">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8028">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8029">en siffra mellan 1 och 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8029">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8030">en bokstav utom S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8030">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8031">en siffra eller bokstav utom S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8031">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8032">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8032">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8033">ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8033">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8034">en bokstav utom S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8034">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8035">en siffra eller bokstav utom S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8035">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8036">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8036">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8037">ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8037">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8038">två bokstäver utom S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8038">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8039">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8039">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8040">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8040">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8041">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8041">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8042">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8042">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8043">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8043">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8044">Det reguljära  `Regex_mbi_card` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8044">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8045">Ett nyckelord  `Keyword_mbi_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8045">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8046">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8046">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8047">Det reguljära  `Regex_mbi_card` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8047">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8048">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8048">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8057">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8057">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8058">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8059">18 tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8059">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8060">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8060">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8061">fyra bokstäver (inkänsliga versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8061">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8062">Sex siffror som anger ett giltigt datum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8062">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8063">en bokstav – H/h eller M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8063">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8064">Två bokstäver som anger en giltig statuskod i Mexico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8064">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8065">tre bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8065">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8066">en bokstav eller en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8066">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8067">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8067">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8068">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8069">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8069">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8070">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8071">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8072">Funktionen hittar  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8072">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8073">Ett nyckelord  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8073">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8074">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8074">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8075">Funktionen hittar  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8075">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8096">Nederländska medborgares servicenummer (BSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8096">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8097">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8098">Åtta eller nio siffror som innehåller valfria blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8098">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8099">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8100">åtta-nio siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8100">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8101">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8101">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8102">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8102">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8103">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8103">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8104">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8104">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8105">två-tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8105">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8106">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8107">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8107">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8108">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8109">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8110">Funktionen för Func_netherlands_bsn hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8110">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8111">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_netherlands_bsn hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8111">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8112">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8112">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8136">Nederländska körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8136">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8137">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8138">10 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8138">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8139">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8140">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8140">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8141">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8142">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8142">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8143">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8144">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8144">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8145">Det reguljära  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8145">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8146">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8146">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8147">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8147">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8148">Keywords_eu_driver är s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8148">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8149">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8149">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8150">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8150">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8151">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8151">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8152">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8152">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8153">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8153">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8154">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8154">driverlicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8155">driver lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8155">driver lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8156">driver lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8156">driver lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8157">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8157">driver license</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8274">Nederländska passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8274">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8275">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8276">Nio bokstäver eller siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8276">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8277">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8278">nio bokstäver eller siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8278">nine letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8279">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8280">ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8280">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8281">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8282">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8282">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8283">Det reguljära  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8283">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8284">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8284">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8285">Det reguljära uttrycket hittar datum i formatet `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Exempel - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8285">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8286">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8286">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8287">Det reguljära  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8287">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8288">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8288">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8306">Nederländska skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8306">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8307">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8307">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8308">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8308">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8309">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8309">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8310">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8310">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8311">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8311">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8312">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8312">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8313">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8314">Nio siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8314">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8315">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8316">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8316">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8317">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8318">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8318">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8319">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8320">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8320">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8321">Funktionen hittar  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8321">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8322">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8322">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8323">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8323">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8324">Funktionen hittar  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8324">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8362">Nederländska momsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8362">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8363">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8363">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8364">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8364">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8365">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8365">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8366">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8366">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8367">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8367">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8368">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8368">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8369">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8370">14 tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8370">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8371">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8372">Alfanumeriskt mönster med 14 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8372">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8373">N eller n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8373">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8374">L eller l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8374">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8375">Valfritt blanksteg, punkt eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8375">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8376">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8376">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8377">Valfritt blanksteg, punkt eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8377">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8378">B eller b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8378">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8379">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8379">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8380">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8381">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8381">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8382">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8383">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8384">Funktionen Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8384">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8385">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8385">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8386">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8386">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8387">Funktionen Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8387">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8388">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8388">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8389">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8389">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8396">Bankkontonummer för Nya Zeeland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8396">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8397">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8397">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8398">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8398">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8399">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8399">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8400">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8400">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8401">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8401">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8402">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8402">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8403">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8403">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8404">14-siffrigt till 16-siffrigt mönster med valfri avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8404">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8405">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8406">14-siffrigt till 16-siffrigt mönster med valfri avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8406">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8407">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8407">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8408">Ett valfritt bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8408">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8409">tre till fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8409">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8410">Ett valfritt bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8410">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8411">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8411">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8412">Ett valfritt bindestreck eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8412">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8413">Två till tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8413">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8414">Ett bindestreck eller blanksteg för alternativ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8414">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8415">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8416">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8416">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8417">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8418">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8418">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8419">Funktionen Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8419">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8420">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8420">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8421">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8421">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8422">Funktionen Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8422">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8430">New Zealand driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8430">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8431">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8431">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8432">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8432">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8433">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8433">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8434">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8434">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8435">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8435">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8436">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8436">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8437">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8438">åtta tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8438">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8439">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8440">åtta tecken för alfanumeriskt mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8440">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8441">två bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8441">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8442">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8442">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8443">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8444">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8445">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8446">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8446">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8447">Funktionen Func_newzealand_driver_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8447">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8448">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8448">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8449">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8449">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8450">Funktionen Func_newzealand_driver_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8450">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8517">Inåtland i Nya Zeeland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8517">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8518">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8518">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8519">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8519">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8520">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8520">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8521">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8521">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8522">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8522">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8523">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8523">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8524">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8525">Åtta eller nio siffror med valfria avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8525">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8526">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8527">Åtta eller nio siffror med valfria avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8527">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8528">två eller tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8528">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8529">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8529">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8530">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8531">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8531">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8532">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8532">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8533">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8533">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8534">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8534">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8535">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8535">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8536">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8536">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8537">Funktionen för Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8537">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8538">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8538">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8539">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8540">Funktionen för Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8540">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8549">Nya Zeeland med hälsonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8549">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8550">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8551">tre bokstäver, ett blanksteg (valfritt) och fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8551">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8552">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8552">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8553">Tre bokstäver (inte ärendekänsliga) förutom "I" och "O"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8553">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8554">ett blanksteg (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8554">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8555">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8555">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8556">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8557">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8557">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8558">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8559">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8559">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8560">Funktionen Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8560">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8561">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_nz_terms hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8561">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8562">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8562">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8563">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8563">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8564">Funktionen Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8564">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8565">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8565">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8579">Nya Zeelands sociala nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8579">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8580">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8580">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8581">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8581">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8582">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8582">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8583">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8583">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8584">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8584">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8585">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8585">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8586">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8587">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8588">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8589">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8589">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8590">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8590">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8591">Ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8591">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8592">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8592">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8593">Ett valfritt bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8593">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8594">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8594">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8595">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8596">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8596">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8597">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8598">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8598">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8599">Funktionen för Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8599">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8600">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8600">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8601">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8601">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8602">Funktionen för Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8602">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8610">Id-nummer för Norge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8610">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8611">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8612">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8612">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8613">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8614">11 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8614">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8615">Sex siffror i formatet DDMMYY, som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8615">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8616">tresiffrigt enskilt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8616">three-digit individual number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8617">två kontrollsiffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8617">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8618">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8619">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8619">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8620">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8621">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8621">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8622">Funktionen för Func_norway_id_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8622">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8623">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_norway_id_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8623">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8624">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8624">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8625">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8625">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8626">Funktionen Func_norway_id_numbe hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8626">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8627">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8627">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8636">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8636">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8637">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8637">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8638">12 siffror avgränsade med bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8638">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8639">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8639">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8640">12 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8640">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8641">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8641">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8642">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8642">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8643">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8643">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8644">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8644">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8645">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8645">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8646">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8647">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8648">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8649">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8650">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_philippines_unified_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8650">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8651">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_philippines_id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8651">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8654">Enhetligt flerfunktions-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8654">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8655">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8655">UMID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8658">Polens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8658">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8659">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8660">14 siffror med två snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8660">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8661">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8662">14 siffror och två snedstreck:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8662">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8663">fem siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8663">five digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8664">ett snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8664">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8665">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8666">ett snedstreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8666">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8667">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8667">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8668">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8669">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8669">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8670">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8671">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8671">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8672">Det reguljära  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8672">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8673">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8797">Polens identitetskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8797">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8798">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8799">tre bokstäver och sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8799">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8800">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8801">Tre bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga) följt av sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8801">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8802">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8803">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8803">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8804">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8805">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8805">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8806">Funktionen för Func_polish_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8806">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8807">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8807">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8808">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8809">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8809">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8811">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8811">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8813">Wa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8813">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8814">Wa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8815">Wa i nr dowodu to isamoxoci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8815">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8816">Dowód Toósamoòci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8816">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8817">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8817">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8818">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8818">os.</span></span>


## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8819">Polens national-ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8819">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8820">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8821">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8821">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8822">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8822">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8823">Sex siffror som representerar födelsedatum i formatet YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8823">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8824">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8824">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8825">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8825">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8826">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8826">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8827">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8827">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8828">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8828">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8829">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8829">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8830">Funktionen för Func_pesel_identification_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8830">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8831">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_pesel_identification_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8831">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8832">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8832">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8833">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8833">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8834">Funktionen för Func_pesel_identification_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8834">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8835">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
