- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8846">tociesamoóci narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8846">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>


## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8847">Polen passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8847">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8848">Den här typen av känslig information ingår i typen Känslig information i EU Passport Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8848">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8849">Det är också tillgängligt som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8849">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8850">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8850">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8851">Två bokstäver och sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8851">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8852">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8852">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8853">Två bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga) följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8853">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8854">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8855">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8855">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8856">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8857">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8857">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8858">Funktionen hittar `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8858">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8859">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8859">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8860">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8860">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8861">Ett nyckelord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8861">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8862">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8862">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8863">Funktionen hittar `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8863">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8864">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8864">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8865">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8865">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8866">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8866">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8867">Funktionen hittar `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8867">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8868">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8894">PolenS REGON-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8894">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8895">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8895">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8896">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8896">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8897">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8897">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8898">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8898">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8899">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8899">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8900">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8900">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8901">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8901">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8902">9- eller 14-siffrigt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8902">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8903">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8903">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8904">Nio eller fyrsiffriga siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8904">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8905">nio siffror eller</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8905">nine digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8906">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8906">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8907">bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8907">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8908">fem siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8908">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8909">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8910">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8910">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8911">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8912">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8912">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8913">Funktionen för Func_polish_regon_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8913">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8914">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_polish_regon_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8914">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8915">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8915">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8916">Funktionen för Func_polish_regon_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8916">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8917">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8917">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8921">statistiskt id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8921">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8922">statistiskt nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8922">statistical no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8925">regonno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8925">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8926">företags-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8926">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8927">companyid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8927">companyid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8928">companyidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8928">companyidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8929">numer densty denny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8929">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8930">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8930">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8931">numerstatystynikny #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8931">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8933">Polens skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8933">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8934">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8934">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8935">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8935">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8936">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8936">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8937">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8937">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8938">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8938">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8939">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8939">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8940">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8941">11 siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8941">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8942">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8943">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8943">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8944">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8945">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8945">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8946">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8947">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8948">Funktionen hittar  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8948">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8949">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8949">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8979">Portugal med kreditkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8979">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8980">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8981">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8981">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8982">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8983">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8983">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8984">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8985">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8985">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8986">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8987">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8987">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8988">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_portugal_citizen_card hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8988">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-8989">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_portugal_citizen_card hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-8989">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9009">Portugals körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9009">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9010">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9011">två mönster – två bokstäver följt av 5–8 siffror med specialtecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9011">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9012">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9013">Mönster 1: Två bokstäver följt av 5/6 med specialtecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9013">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9014">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9014">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9015">Ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9015">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9016">Fem eller sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9016">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9017">Ett blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9017">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9018">En siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9018">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9019">Mönster 2: En bokstav följt av 6/8 siffror med specialtecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9019">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9020">En bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9020">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9021">Ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9021">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9022">Sex eller åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9022">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9023">Ett blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9023">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9024">En siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9024">One digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9025">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9026">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9026">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9027">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9028">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9028">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9029">Det reguljära  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9029">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9030">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9030">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9162">Portugal passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9162">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9163">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9164">en bokstav följt av sex siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9164">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9165">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9166">en bokstav följt av sex siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9166">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9167">en bokstav (inte en ärendekänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9167">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9168">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9168">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9169">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9170">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9170">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9171">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9172">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9173">Det reguljära  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9173">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9174">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9175">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9175">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9176">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9177">Det reguljära  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9177">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9178">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9205">Portugals skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9205">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9206">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9207">Nio siffror med valfria blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9207">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9208">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9208">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9209">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9209">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9210">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9210">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9211">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9211">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9212">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9212">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9213">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9213">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9214">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9215">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9216">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9217">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9217">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9218">Funktionen hittar  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9218">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9219">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9219">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9220">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9220">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9221">Funktionen hittar  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9221">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9246">Rumäniens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9246">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9247">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9247">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9248">ett tecken följt av åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9248">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9249">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9249">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9250">ett tecken följt av åtta siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9250">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9251">en bokstav (inte en teckenkänslig) eller en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9251">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9252">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9252">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9253">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9254">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9254">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9255">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9256">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9256">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9257">Det reguljära  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9257">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9258">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9258">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9386">Rumäniens personliga numeriska kod (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9386">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9387">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9388">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9389">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9390">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9391">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9392">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9393">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9394">13 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9394">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9395">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9395">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9396">en siffra från 1–9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9396">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9397">Sex siffror som representerar födelsedatum (DSMMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9397">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9398">två siffror, som kan vara 01-52 eller 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9398">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9399">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9399">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9400">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9401">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9401">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9402">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9403">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9403">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9404">Funktionen hittar  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9404">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9405">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9405">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9406">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9406">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9407">Funktionen hittar  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9407">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9458">Rumänien, passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9458">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9459">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9460">Åtta eller nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9460">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9461">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9462">Åtta eller nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9462">eight or nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9463">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9464">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9464">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9465">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9466">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9466">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9467">Det reguljära  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9467">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9468">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9468">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9469">Det reguljära uttrycket hittar datum i `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` formatet DD MMM/MMM YY (Exempel- 01 FEB/10 FEB) eller ett nyckelord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` från hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9469">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9470">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9470">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9471">Det reguljära  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9471">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9472">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9472">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9491">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9491">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9492">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9492">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9493">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9493">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9494">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9494">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9495">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9495">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9496">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9496">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9497">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9498">10-siffrigt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9498">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9499">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9500">10-siffrigt nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9500">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9501">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9501">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9502">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9502">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9503">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9503">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9504">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9504">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9505">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9505">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9506">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9506">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9507">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9507">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9508">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9509">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9509">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9510">Regex-Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9510">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9511">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9511">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9528">Ryssland passnummer internationellt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9528">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9529">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9529">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9530">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9530">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9531">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9531">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9532">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9532">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9533">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9533">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9534">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9534">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9535">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9535">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9537">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9538">niosiffriga nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9538">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9539">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9539">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9540">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9540">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9541">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9541">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9542">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9543">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9543">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9544">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9545">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9545">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9546">Regex-Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9546">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9547">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9547">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9564">Saudiarabiens national-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9564">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9565">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9566">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9566">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9567">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9568">10 siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9568">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9569">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9570">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9570">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9571">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9572">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9572">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9573">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9573">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9574">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9574">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9575">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9575">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9576">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9576">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9579">ID-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9579">ID number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9580">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9580">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span>


## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9581">Nummer till Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9581">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9582">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9582">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9583">nio bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9583">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9584">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9584">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9585">Nio bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9585">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9586">bokstaven "F", "G", "S" eller "T" (inte ärendekänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9586">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9587">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9587">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9588">en alfabetisk kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9588">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9589">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9589">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9590">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9590">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9591">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9591">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9592">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9592">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9593">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_singapore_nric hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9593">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9594">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_singapore_nric hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9594">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9595">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9595">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9596">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9596">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9597">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_singapore_nric hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9597">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9598">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9598">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9599">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9599">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9609">Slovakiens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9609">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9610">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9611">ett tecken följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9611">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9612">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9613">ett tecken följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9613">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9614">en bokstav (inte en teckenkänslig) eller en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9614">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9615">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9615">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9616">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9617">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9617">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9618">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9619">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9620">Det reguljära  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9620">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9621">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9621">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9747">Personligt nummer för Slovakien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9747">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9748">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9748">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9749">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9749">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9750">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9750">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9751">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9751">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9752">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9752">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9753">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9753">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9754">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9755">nio eller 10 siffror som innehåller valfria omslag</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9755">nine or 10 digits containing optional backslash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9756">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9756">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9757">Sex siffror som representerar födelsedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9757">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9758">valfritt snedstreck (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9758">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9759">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9759">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9760">en valfri kontrollsiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9760">one optional check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9761">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9762">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9762">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9763">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9764">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9765">Funktionen hittar  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9765">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9766">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9766">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9767">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9767">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9768">Funktionen hittar  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9768">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9815">Slovakiens passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9815">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9816">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9817">en siffra eller bokstav följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9817">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9818">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9819">en siffra eller bokstav (inte en teckenkänslig) följt av sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9819">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9820">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9821">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9821">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9822">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9823">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9823">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9824">Det reguljära  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9824">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9825">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9825">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9826">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9826">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9827">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9828">Det reguljära  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9828">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9829">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9829">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9851">Sloveniens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9851">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9852">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9853">Nio siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9853">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9854">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9855">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9855">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9856">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9857">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9857">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9858">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9859">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9859">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9860">Det reguljära  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9860">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9861">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9861">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
