## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9988">Slovenska unik master number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9988">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9989">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9989">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9990">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9990">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9991">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9991">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9992">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9992">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9993">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9993">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9994">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9994">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9995">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9996">13 siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9996">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9997">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9998">13 siffror i det angivna mönstret:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9998">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-9999">sju siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet (DDMMLLL) där "LLL" motsvarar de tre sista siffrorna i födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-9999">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10000">två siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10000">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10001">Tre siffror som motsvarar en kombination av kön och serienummer för personer som föds på samma dag.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10001">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10002">000–499 för man och 500–999 för kvinna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10002">000-499 for male and 500-999 for female.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10003">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10003">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10004">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10005">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10005">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10006">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10007">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10007">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10008">Funktionen hittar  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10008">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10009">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10009">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10010">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10010">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10011">Funktionen hittar  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10011">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10039">Slovenska passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10039">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10040">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10040">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10041">Två bokstäver följt av sju siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10041">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10042">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10042">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10043">Två bokstäver följt av sju siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10043">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10044">bokstaven "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10044">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10045">en versal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10045">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10046">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10046">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10047">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10048">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10048">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10049">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10050">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10051">Det reguljära  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10051">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10052">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10052">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10053">Det reguljära `Regex_eu_passport_date1` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD.MM.YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10053">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10054">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10055">Det reguljära  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10055">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10056">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10079">Slovenska skatteidentifieringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10079">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10080">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10080">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10081">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10081">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10082">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10082">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10083">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10083">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10084">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10084">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10085">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10085">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10086">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10087">Åtta siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10087">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10088">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10088">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10089">en siffra från 1–9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10089">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10090">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10090">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10091">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10091">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10092">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10093">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10093">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10094">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10095">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10095">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10096">Funktionen hittar  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10096">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10097">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10097">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10098">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10098">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10099">Funktionen hittar  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10099">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10100">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10100">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10104">številka davčne datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10104">številka davčne datoteke</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10107">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10107">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10123">South Africa identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10123">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10124">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10125">13 siffror som kan innehålla blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10125">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10126">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10127">13 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10127">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10128">Sex siffror i formatet YYMMDD, som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10128">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10129">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10129">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10130">en ensiffrig indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10130">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10131">siffran "8" eller "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10131">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10132">en siffra, som är en kontrollsummasiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10132">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10133">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10134">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10134">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10135">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10136">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10136">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10137">Funktionen för Func_south_africa_identification_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10137">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10138">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_south_africa_identification_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10138">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10139">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10141">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10141">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10145">Registreringsnummer för sydkoreanska invånare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10145">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10146">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10147">13 siffror som innehåller ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10147">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10148">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10148">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10149">13 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10149">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10150">Sex siffror i formatet YYMMDD, som är födelsedatumet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10150">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10151">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10151">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10152">en siffra som bestäms av talet och kön</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10152">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10153">fyrsiffrig födelsedatumskod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10153">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10154">en siffra som används för att särskilja personer som de föregående siffrorna är identiska för</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10154">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10155">en kontrollsiffra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10155">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10156">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10157">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10157">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10158">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10159">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10159">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10160">Funktionen för Func_south_korea_resident_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10160">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10161">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_south_korea_resident_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10161">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10162">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10162">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10163">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10163">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10164">Funktionen för Func_south_korea_resident_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10164">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10165">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10165">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10173">Spaniens körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10173">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10174">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10175">Åtta siffror följt av ett tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10175">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10176">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10177">Åtta siffror följt av ett tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10177">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10178">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10178">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10179">en siffra eller bokstav (inte en teckenkänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10179">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10180">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10181">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10182">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10183">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10184">Funktionen eller  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` hittar innehåll som matchar `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10184">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10185">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10185">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10186">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10187">Funktionen eller  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` hittar innehåll som matchar `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10187">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10321">Spanien DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10321">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10322">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10322">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10323">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10323">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10324">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10324">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10325">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10325">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10326">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10326">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10327">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10327">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10328">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10329">Åtta siffror följt av ett tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10329">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10330">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10331">sju siffror följt av ett tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10331">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10332">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10332">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10333">Ett valfritt blanksteg eller bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10333">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10334">en bkryssbokstav (inte fallkänslig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10334">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10335">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10336">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10337">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10338">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10338">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10339">Funktionen eller  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` hittar innehåll som matchar `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10339">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10340">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10340">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10341">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10341">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10342">Funktionen eller  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` hittar innehåll som matchar `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10342">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10366">Spanien passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10366">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10367">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10368">En kombination av åtta eller nio tecken med bokstäver och siffror utan blanksteg eller avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10368">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10369">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10370">En kombination av åtta eller nio tecken med bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10370">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10371">två siffror eller bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10371">two digits or letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10372">en siffra eller bokstav (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10372">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10373">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10373">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10374">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10375">Ej tillämpligt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10375">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10376">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10377">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10377">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10378">Det reguljära  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10378">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10379">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10379">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10380">Det reguljära `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` uttrycket hittar datum i formatet DD-MM-YYYY eller ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_date` hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10380">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10381">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10381">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10382">Det reguljära  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10382">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10383">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10383">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10412">Spaniens personnummer (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10412">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10413">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10414">11–12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10414">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10415">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10416">11–12 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10416">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10417">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10417">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10418">ett snedstreck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10418">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10419">sju till åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10419">seven to eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10420">ett snedstreck (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10420">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10421">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10421">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10422">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10423">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10423">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10424">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10425">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10425">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10426">Funktionen för Func_spanish_social_security_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10426">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10427">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10427">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10428">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10428">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10429">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10430">Funktionen för Func_spanish_social_security_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10430">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10431">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10431">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10432">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10432">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10433">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10433">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10434">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10434">ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10436">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10436">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10437">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10437">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10438">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10438">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10439">número de la seguridad social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10439">número de la seguridad social</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10440">Skatteidentifieringsnummer för Spanien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10440">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10441">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10441">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10442">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10442">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10443">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10443">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10444">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10444">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10445">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10445">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10446">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10446">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10447">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10448">sju eller åtta siffror och en eller två bokstäver i det angivna mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10448">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10449">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10450">Spanska naturliga personer med ett Spanien National Identity Card:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10450">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10451">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10451">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10452">en versaler (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10452">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10453">Non-resident Sstraards utan ett Spain National Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10453">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10454">en versaler "L" (gemener/versaler) (gemener/VERSALER) (gemener och versaler) (gemener/VERSALER)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10454">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10455">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10455">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10456">en versaler (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10456">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10457">Invånare som är under 14 år utan spaniens nationalidentitetskort:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10457">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10458">en versal "K" (gemener/versaler) (gemener och versaler) (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10458">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10459">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10459">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10460">en versaler (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10460">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10462">en versal som är "X", "Y" eller "Z" (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10462">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10463">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10463">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10464">en versaler (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10464">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10466">en versal som är "M" (gemener/versaler) (gemener och versaler) (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10466">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10467">sju siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10467">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10468">en versaler (gemener och versaler)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10468">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10469">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10470">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10470">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10471">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10472">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10472">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10473">Funktionen eller  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` hittar innehåll som matchar `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10473">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10474">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10474">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10475">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10476">Funktionen eller  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` hittar innehåll som matchar `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10476">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10507">SQL Server en anslutningssträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10507">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10508">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10509">Strängen "Användar-ID", "Användar-ID", "uid" eller "UserId" följt av de tecken och strängar som beskrivs i mönstret nedan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10509">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10510">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10510">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10511">strängen "Användar-ID", "Användar-ID", "uid" eller "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10511">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10512">valfri kombination av 1–200 gemener eller versaler, siffror, symboler, specialtecken eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10512">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10513">strängen "Lösenord" eller "pwd" där "pwd" inte föregås av en gemener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10513">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10514">Ett likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10514">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10515">alla tecken som inte är ett dollartecken ($), procenttecken (%) större än symbol (>), symbol (@), citattecken ("), semikolon (;), vänster klammerparentes([) eller vänster klammerparentes ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10515">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10516">valfri kombination av 7–128 tecken som inte är ett semikolon (;), snedstreck (/) eller citattecken (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10516">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10517">Semikolon (;) eller citattecken (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10517">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10518">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10518">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10519">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10519">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10520">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10520">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10521">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10521">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10522">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10522">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10523">Ett nyckelord CEP_GlobalFilter hittades inte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10523">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10524">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10524">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10525">Det reguljära uttrycket CEP_CommonExampleKeywords hittar inte innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10525">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10526">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10526">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10527">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10527">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10528">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10528">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10529">någotlösenord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10529">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10530">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10530">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10531">exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10531">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10532">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10532">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10533">Med den här typen av känslig information identifieras dessa nyckelord med hjälp av ett reguljärt uttryck, inte i en nyckelordslista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10533">This sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10534">Lösenord eller pwd följt av 0-2 blanksteg, ett likhetstecken (=), 0-2 blanksteg och en asterisk (\*) -ELLER-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10534">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10535">Lösenord eller pwd följt av:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10535">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10536">Likhetstecken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10536">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10537">Mindre än-symbol (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10537">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10538">En kombination av 1–200 tecken som är versaler eller gemener, siffror, asterisk (\*), bindestreck (-), understrykning (_) eller blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10538">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10539">Större än-symbol (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10539">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10540">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10540">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10541">Med den här typen av känslig information identifieras dessa nyckelord med hjälp av ett reguljärt uttryck, inte i en nyckelordslista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10541">This sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10553">Sverigedrivrutinens licensnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10553">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10554">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10555">10 siffror som innehåller ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10555">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10556">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10557">10 siffror som innehåller ett bindestreck:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10557">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10558">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10558">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10559">ett bindestreck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10559">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10560">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10560">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10561">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10562">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10562">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10563">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10564">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10565">Det reguljära  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` uttrycket hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10565">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10566">Ett nyckelord från  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` eller `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10699">National ID för Sverige</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10699">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10700">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10701">10 eller 12 siffror och en valfri avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10701">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10702">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10703">10 eller 12 siffror och en valfri avgränsare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10703">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10704">två siffror (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10704">two digits (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10705">Sex siffror i datumformat YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10705">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10706">avgränsare av "-" eller "+" (valfritt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10706">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10707">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10707">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10708">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10709">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10710">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10711">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10712">Funktionen hittar `Func_swedish_national_identifier` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10712">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10713">Ett nyckelord `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` från hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10713">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10714">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10715">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10716">Funktionen hittar `Func_swedish_national_identifier` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10716">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10717">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10717">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10736">Sverige passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10736">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10737">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10738">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10738">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10739">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10740">åtta siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10740">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10741">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10742">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10742">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10743">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10744">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10744">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10745">det reguljära uttrycket Regex_sweden_passport_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10745">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10746">ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keyword_sweden_passport` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10746">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10747">det reguljära uttrycket hittar ett datum i formatet `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) eller ett `Keywords_eu_passport_date` nyckelord från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10747">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10748">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10749">det reguljära uttrycket Regex_sweden_passport_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10749">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10750">ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keyword_sweden_passport` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10750">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
