## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10786">Skatteidentifieringsnummer i Sverige</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10786">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10787">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10787">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10788">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10788">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10789">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10789">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10790">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10790">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10791">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10791">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10792">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10792">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10793">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10794">10 siffror och en symbol i det angivna mönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10794">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10795">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10796">10 siffror och en symbol:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10796">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10797">Sex siffror som motsvarar födelsedatumet (AMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10797">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10798">ett plustecken eller minustecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10798">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10799">Tre siffror som gör ID-numret unikt där:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10799">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10800">för nummer som utfärdats före 1990, den sjunde och åttonde siffran identifiera födelsedatum eller foreign-born people</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10800">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10801">Siffran i den nionde positionen anger kön med antingen udda för man eller till och med för kvinna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10801">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10802">en checksiffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10802">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10803">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10804">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10804">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10805">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10806">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10807">Funktionen hittar  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10807">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10808">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10808">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10809">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10810">Funktionen hittar  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10810">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10836">SWIFT-kod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10836">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10837">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10838">fyra bokstäver följt av 5–31 bokstäver eller siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10838">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10839">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10840">fyra bokstäver följt av 5–31 bokstäver eller siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10840">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10841">bankkod på fyra bokstäver (inte ärendekänsligt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10841">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10842">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10842">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10843">4–28 bokstäver eller siffror (BBAN (Basic Bank Account Number))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10843">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10844">ett valfritt blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10844">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10845">en till tre bokstäver eller siffror (resten av BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10845">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10846">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10847">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10848">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10849">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10850">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_swift hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10850">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10851">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_swift hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10851">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10888">Schweiz SSN AHV-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10888">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10889">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10889">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10890">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10890">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10891">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10891">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10892">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10892">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10893">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10893">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10894">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10894">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10895">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10896">13-siffrigt nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10896">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10897">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10898">13-siffrigt nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10898">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10899">tre siffror – 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10899">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10900">en valfri punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10900">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10901">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10901">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10902">en valfri punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10902">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10903">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10903">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10904">en valfri punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10904">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10905">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10905">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10906">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10907">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10907">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10908">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10909">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10909">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10910">Funktionen för Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10910">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10911">Ett nyckelord från Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10911">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10912">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10913">Funktionen för Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10913">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10926">unikt ID-nummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10926">unique identification no.</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10934">Taiwans national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10934">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10935">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10936">en bokstav (på engelska) följt av nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10936">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10937">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10938">en bokstav (på engelska) följt av nio siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10938">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10939">en bokstav (på engelska, inte den där den är det.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10939">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10940">siffran "1" eller "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10940">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10941">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10941">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10942">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10943">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10943">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10944">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10945">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10946">Funktionen för Func_taiwanese_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10946">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10947">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_taiwanese_national_id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10947">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10948">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10949">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10950">Funktionen för Func_taiwanese_national_id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10950">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10951">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10959">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10959">身分證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10960">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10960">身分證號碼</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10961">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10961">身份證號</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10962">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10962">身分證統一編號</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10963">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10963">國民身分證統一編號</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10964">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10964">簽名</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10967">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10967">簽章</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10968">Taiwan passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10968">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10969">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10969">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10970">biometrisk passnummer: nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10970">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10971">icke-biometrisk passnummer: nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10971">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10972">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10972">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10973">biometrisk pass nummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10973">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10974">tecknet "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10974">the character "3"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10975">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10975">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10976">icke-biometrisk passnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10976">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10977">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10977">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10978">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10979">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10979">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10980">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10981">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10982">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_taiwan_passport hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10982">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10983">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_taiwan_passport hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10983">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10985">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10985">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10991">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10991">护照</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10993">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10993">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10994">Taiwan-intjänat certifikat (ARC/TARC) nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10994">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10995">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10996">10 bokstäver och siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10996">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10997">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10998">10 bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10998">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-10999">Två bokstäver (inte versaler och teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-10999">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11000">åtta siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11000">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11001">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11002">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11002">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11003">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11004">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11005">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11005">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11006">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11006">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11012">ID-kort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11012">Identification card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11019">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11019">台灣地區居留證</span></span>

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11020">Identifieringskod för thailändska</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11020">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11021">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11022">13 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11022">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11023">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11024">13 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11024">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11025">första siffran är inte noll eller nio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11025">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11026">12 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11026">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11027">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11028">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11028">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11029">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11030">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11030">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11031">Funktionen för Func_Thai_Citizen_Id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11031">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11032">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11032">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11033">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11033">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11034">Funktionen för Func_Thai_Citizen_Id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11034">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11035">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11035">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11037">ID-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11037">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11038">Id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11038">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11039">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11039">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11040">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11040">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11041">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11041">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11043">Turkiska national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11043">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11044">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11045">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11045">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11046">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11047">11 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11047">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11048">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11048">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11049">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11049">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11050">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11050">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11051">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11051">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11052">Funktionen för Func_Turkish_National_Id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11052">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11053">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Turkish_National_Id hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11053">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11054">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11055">Funktionen för Func_Turkish_National_Id hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11055">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11056">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11056">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11058">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11058">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11059">TC Kimlik nuısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11059">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11060">Vatandaşlık nuısı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11060">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11061">Vatandaşlık no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11061">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11062">Storbritannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11062">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11063">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11063">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11064">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11065">Kombination av 18 bokstäver och siffror i det angivna formatet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11065">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11066">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11067">18 bokstäver och siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11067">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11068">Fem bokstäver (inte ärendekänsliga) eller siffran "9" i stället för en bokstav.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11068">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11069">En siffra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11069">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11070">Fem siffror i datumformatet MMDDY för födelsedatumet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11070">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11071">Det sjunde tecknet ökas med 50 om drivrutinen är kvinna. för prov, 51 till 62 i stället för 01 till 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11071">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11072">Två bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga) eller siffran "9" i stället för en bokstav.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11072">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11073">Fem siffror.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11073">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11074">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11075">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11076">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11077">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11077">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11078">Funktionen hittar `Func_uk_drivers_license` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11078">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11079">Ett nyckelord `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11079">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11080">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11080">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11081">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11081">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11082">Funktionen hittar `Func_uk_drivers_license` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11082">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11083">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11083">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11204">Storbritannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11204">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11205">nummer för att samla, rulla ut, 75</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11205">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11206">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11207">två bokstäver följt av 1–4 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11207">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11208">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11209">Två bokstäver (inte teckenkänsliga) följt av 1–4 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11209">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11210">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11210">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11211">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11211">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11212">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11212">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11213">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11214">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_uk_electoral hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11214">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11215">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_uk_electoral hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11215">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11216">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11216">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11218">mötesmöte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11218">council nomination</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11219">formulär för att skapa en 20</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11219">nomination form</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11220">register över registrering av registrer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11220">electoral register</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11221">roll för underse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11221">electoral roll</span></span>


## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11222">Storbritannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11222">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11223">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11223">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11224">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11225">10–17 siffror avgränsade med blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11225">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11226">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11227">10–17 siffror:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11227">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11228">antingen 3 eller 10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11228">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11229">ett blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11229">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11230">tre siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11230">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11231">ett blanksteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11231">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11232">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11232">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11233">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11234">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11235">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11236">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11237">Funktionen för Func_uk_nhs_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11237">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11238">Något av följande är sant:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11239">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_uk_nhs_number hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11239">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11240">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11240">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11241">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11241">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11242">Kontrollsumman passeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11248">hälsoutfärdare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11248">health authority</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11250">patient-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11250">patient id</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11260">Storbritannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11260">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11262">Den här typen av känslig information ingår i den nationella identifieringstypen (EU).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11262">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11263">Det är också tillgängligt som en fristående typ av känslig information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11263">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11264">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11265">Sju tecken eller nio tecken avgränsade med blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11265">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11266">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11267">två möjliga mönster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11267">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11268">två bokstäver (giltiga NINOs använder bara vissa tecken i det här prefixet, som det här mönstret verifierar, inte de är det.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11268">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11269">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11269">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11270">antingen "A", "B", "C" eller "D" (t.ex. prefixet tillåts bara vissa tecken i suffixet, inte teckenkänsliga)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11270">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11271">ELLER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11272">två bokstäver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11272">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11273">blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11273">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11274">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11274">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11275">blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11275">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11276">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11276">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11277">blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11277">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11278">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11278">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11279">blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11279">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11280">antingen "A", "B", "C" eller "D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11280">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11281">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11282">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11282">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11283">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11284">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11284">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11285">Funktionen för Func_uk_nino hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11285">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11286">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_uk_nino hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11286">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11287">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11287">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11288">Funktionen för Func_uk_nino hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11288">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11310">Storbritannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11310">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11311">Unique Taxpayer-referensnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11311">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11312">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11312">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11313">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11313">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11315">informationsstyrning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11315">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11316">hantering av arkivhandlingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11316">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11317">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11317">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11318">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11319">10 siffror utan blanksteg och avgränsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11319">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>


### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11320">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11321">10 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11321">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11322">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11323">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11323">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11324">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11325">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11326">Funktionen hittar  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11326">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11327">Ett nyckelord  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` från hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11327">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11347">U.S. bank account number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11347">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11348">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11348">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11349">6-17 siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11349">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11350">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11350">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11351">6–17 siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11351">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11352">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11353">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11354">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11355">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11356">Det reguljära uttrycket Regex_usa_bank_account_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11356">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11357">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_usa_Bank_Account hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11357">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11387">U.S. driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11387">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11388">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11389">Beror på delstat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11389">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11390">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11391">beror på delstat – till exempel New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11391">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11392">Nio siffror med formatet sss sss sss matchar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11392">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11393">Nio siffror med ssssssssss matchar inte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11393">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11394">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11395">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11396">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11397">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11398">Funktionen för Func_new_york_drivers_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11398">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11399">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11399">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11400">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_us_drivers_license hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11400">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11401">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11401">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11402">Funktionen för Func_new_york_drivers_license_number hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11402">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11403">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11403">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11404">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11404">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11405">Inget nyckelord från Keyword_us_drivers_license hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11405">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11503">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11503">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11504">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11505">Nio siffror som börjar med "9" och innehåller "7" eller "8" som fjärde siffra, alternativt formaterade med blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11505">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11506">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11507">formaterat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11507">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11508">siffran "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11508">the digit "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11509">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11509">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11510">blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11510">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11511">a "7" eller "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11511">a "7" or "8"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11512">en siffra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11512">a digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11513">blanksteg eller streck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11513">a space, or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11514">fyra siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11514">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11515">oformaterad:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11515">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11516">siffran "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11516">the digit "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11517">två siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11517">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11518">a "7" eller "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11518">a "7" or "8"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11519">fem siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11519">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11520">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11521">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11522">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11523">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11523">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11524">Funktionen för Func_formatted_itin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11524">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11525">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_itin hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11525">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11526">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11527">Funktionen Func_unformatted_itin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11527">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11528">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_itin hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11528">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11529">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11530">Funktionen Func_formatted_itin eller Func_unformatted_itin hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11530">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11531">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11531">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11532">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11532">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11537">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11537">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11538">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11538">ssn</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11545">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11545">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11546">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11546">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11547">nio siffror, som kan vara i ett formaterat eller oformaterat mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11547">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11548">Om det har utfärdats före mitten av 2011 har SSN stark formatering där vissa delar av numret måste faller inom vissa intervall för att vara giltigt (men det finns ingen kontrollsumma).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11548">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11549">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11549">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11550">fyra funktioner söker efter SSN i fyra olika mönster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11550">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11551">Func_ssn söker efter SSN med stark formatering före 2011 som är formaterade med streck eller blanksteg (s-ss-s eller s)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11551">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn söker efter SSN med stark formatering före 2011 som är oformaterade som nio siffror i följd (sss)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn söker efter SSN efter 2011 som är formaterade med streck eller blanksteg (s-ss-s eller s s)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn söker efter SSN efter 2011 som är oformaterade som nio siffror i följd (ss)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11555">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11556">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11556">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11557">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11558">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11558">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11559">Funktionen för Func_ssn hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11559">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11560">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_ssn hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11560">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11561">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11562">Funktionen för Func_unformatted_ssn hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11562">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11563">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_ssn hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11563">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11564">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11564">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11565">Funktionen Func_randomized_formatted_ssn hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11565">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11566">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_ssn hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11566">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11567">En DLP-princip har låg konfidens för att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11567">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11568">Funktionen för Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11568">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11569">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_ssn hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11569">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```
