## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11584">U.S. / Storbritannien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11584">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11585">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11585">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11586">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11587">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11588">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11589">nio siffror i följd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11589">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11590">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11591">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11591">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11592">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11593">En DLP-princip har hög säkerhet att den har upptäckt den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11593">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11594">Funktionen för Func_usa_uk_passport hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11594">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11595">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11595">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11596">Ett nyckelord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` från hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11596">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11597">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11597">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11598">Funktionen för Func_usa_uk_passport hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11598">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11599">Ett nyckelord från `Keywords_eu_passport_number` eller `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11599">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11616">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11616">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11618">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11618">communication compliance policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11622">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11623">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11623">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11624">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11625">nio siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11625">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11626">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11626">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11628">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11629">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11629">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11630">Regex-Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11630">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11631">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11631">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11641">Den här typen av känslig information kan bara användas i:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11641">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11642">principer för dataförlustskydd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11642">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11643">policyer för kommunikationsefterlevnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11643">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11646">Säkerhet för Microsoft-molnappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11646">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11647">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11647">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11648">Alfanumeriskt mönster med åtta tecken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11648">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11649">Mönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11650">Alfanumeriskt mönster med åtta tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11650">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11651">två bokstäver eller siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11651">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11652">sex siffror</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11652">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11653">Kontrollsumma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11653">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11654">Nej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11654">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11655">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11655">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11656">En DLP-princip har med medelhög säkerhet identifierat den här typen av känslig information om följande inifrån 300 tecken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11656">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11657">Regex-Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International hittar innehåll som matchar mönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11657">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11658">Ett nyckelord från Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International hittas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11658">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11659">Nyckelord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11659">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11660">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11660">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b25f3-11665">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b25f3-11665">номер паспорта</span></span>
